21template<typename eT>
22inline
23Mat<eT>::~Mat()
24 {
25 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
26
27 if(n_alloc > 0)
28 {
29 arma_extra_debug_print("Mat::destructor: releasing memory");
30 memory::release( access::rw(mem) );
31 }
32
33 // try to expose buggy user code that accesses deleted objects
34 if(arma_config::debug) { access::rw(mem) = nullptr; }
35
36 arma_type_check(( is_supported_elem_type<eT>::value == false ));
37 }
38
39
40
41template<typename eT>
42inline
43Mat<eT>::Mat()
44 : n_rows(0)
45 , n_cols(0)
46 , n_elem(0)
47 , n_alloc(0)
48 , vec_state(0)
49 , mem_state(0)
50 , mem()
51 {
52 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
53 }
54
55
56
58template<typename eT>
59inline
60Mat<eT>::Mat(const uword in_n_rows, const uword in_n_cols)
61 : n_rows(in_n_rows)
62 , n_cols(in_n_cols)
63 , n_elem(in_n_rows*in_n_cols)
64 , n_alloc()
65 , vec_state(0)
66 , mem_state(0)
67 , mem()
68 {
69 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
70
71 init_cold();
72
73 #if (!defined(ARMA_DONT_ZERO_INIT))
74 {
75 arma_extra_debug_print("Mat::constructor: zeroing memory");
76 arrayops::fill_zeros(memptr(), n_elem);
77 }
78 #endif
79 }
80
81
82
83template<typename eT>
84inline
85Mat<eT>::Mat(const SizeMat& s)
86 : n_rows(s.n_rows)
87 , n_cols(s.n_cols)
88 , n_elem(s.n_rows*s.n_cols)
89 , n_alloc()
90 , vec_state(0)
91 , mem_state(0)
92 , mem()
93 {
94 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
95
96 init_cold();
97
98 #if (!defined(ARMA_DONT_ZERO_INIT))
99 {
100 arma_extra_debug_print("Mat::constructor: zeroing memory");
101 arrayops::fill_zeros(memptr(), n_elem);
102 }
103 #endif
104 }

109template<typename eT>
110template<bool do_zeros>
111inline
112Mat<eT>::Mat(const uword in_n_rows, const uword in_n_cols, const arma_initmode_indicator<do_zeros>&)
113 : n_rows(in_n_rows)
114 , n_cols(in_n_cols)
115 , n_elem(in_n_rows*in_n_cols)
116 , n_alloc()
117 , vec_state(0)
118 , mem_state(0)
119 , mem()
120 {
121 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
122
123 init_cold();
124
125 if(do_zeros)
126 {
127 arma_extra_debug_print("Mat::constructor: zeroing memory");
128 arrayops::fill_zeros(memptr(), n_elem);
129 }
130 }

135template<typename eT>
136template<bool do_zeros>
137inline
138Mat<eT>::Mat(const SizeMat& s, const arma_initmode_indicator<do_zeros>&)
139 : n_rows(s.n_rows)
140 , n_cols(s.n_cols)
141 , n_elem(s.n_rows*s.n_cols)
142 , n_alloc()
143 , vec_state(0)
144 , mem_state(0)
145 , mem()
146 {
147 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
148
149 init_cold();
150
151 if(do_zeros)
152 {
153 arma_extra_debug_print("Mat::constructor: zeroing memory");
154 arrayops::fill_zeros(memptr(), n_elem);
155 }
156 }

161template<typename eT>
162template<typename fill_type>
163inline
164Mat<eT>::Mat(const uword in_n_rows, const uword in_n_cols, const fill::fill_class<fill_type>& f)
165 : n_rows(in_n_rows)
166 , n_cols(in_n_cols)
167 , n_elem(in_n_rows*in_n_cols)
168 , n_alloc()
169 , vec_state(0)
170 , mem_state(0)
171 , mem()
172 {
173 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
174
175 init_cold();
176
177 (*this).fill(f);
178 }

182template<typename eT>
183template<typename fill_type>
184inline
185Mat<eT>::Mat(const SizeMat& s, const fill::fill_class<fill_type>& f)
186 : n_rows(s.n_rows)
187 , n_cols(s.n_cols)
188 , n_elem(s.n_rows*s.n_cols)
189 , n_alloc()
190 , vec_state(0)
191 , mem_state(0)
192 , mem()
193 {
194 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
195
196 init_cold();
197
198 (*this).fill(f);
199 }

204template<typename eT>
205inline
206Mat<eT>::Mat(const arma_vec_indicator&, const uhword in_vec_state)
207 : n_rows( (in_vec_state == 2) ? 1 : 0 )
208 , n_cols( (in_vec_state == 1) ? 1 : 0 )
209 , n_elem(0)
210 , n_alloc(0)
211 , vec_state(in_vec_state)
212 , mem_state(0)
213 , mem()
214 {
215 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
216 }

221template<typename eT>
222inline
223Mat<eT>::Mat(const arma_vec_indicator&, const uword in_n_rows, const uword in_n_cols, const uhword in_vec_state)
224 : n_rows(in_n_rows)
225 , n_cols(in_n_cols)
226 , n_elem(in_n_rows*in_n_cols)
227 , n_alloc()
228 , vec_state(in_vec_state)
229 , mem_state(0)
230 , mem()
231 {
232 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
233
234 init_cold();
235 }

239template<typename eT>
240inline
241Mat<eT>::Mat(const arma_fixed_indicator&, const uword in_n_rows, const uword in_n_cols, const uhword in_vec_state, const eT* in_mem)
242 : n_rows (in_n_rows)
243 , n_cols (in_n_cols)
244 , n_elem (in_n_rows*in_n_cols)
245 , n_alloc (0)
246 , vec_state (in_vec_state)
247 , mem_state (3)
248 , mem (in_mem)
249 {
250 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
251 }
252
253
254
255template<typename eT>
256inline
257void
258Mat<eT>::init_cold()
259 {
260 arma_extra_debug_sigprint( arma_str::format("n_rows = %d, n_cols = %d") % n_rows % n_cols );
261
262 // ensure that n_elem can hold the result of (n_rows * n_cols)
263
264 #if defined(ARMA_64BIT_WORD)
265 const char* error_message = "Mat::init(): requested size is too large";
266 #else
267 const char* error_message = "Mat::init(): requested size is too large; suggest to enable ARMA_64BIT_WORD";
268 #endif
269
270 arma_debug_check
271 (
272 (
273 ( (n_rows > ARMA_MAX_UHWORD) || (n_cols > ARMA_MAX_UHWORD) )
274 ? ( (double(n_rows) * double(n_cols)) > double(ARMA_MAX_UWORD) )
275 : false
276 ),
277 error_message
278 );
279
280 if(n_elem <= arma_config::mat_prealloc)
281 {
282 if(n_elem > 0) { arma_extra_debug_print("Mat::init(): using local memory"); }
283
284 access::rw(mem) = (n_elem == 0) ? nullptr : mem_local;
285 access::rw(n_alloc) = 0;
286 }
287 else
288 {
289 arma_extra_debug_print("Mat::init(): acquiring memory");
290
291 access::rw(mem) = memory::acquire<eT>(n_elem);
292 access::rw(n_alloc) = n_elem;
293 }
294 }
295
296
297
298template<typename eT>
299inline
300void
301Mat<eT>::init_warm(uword in_n_rows, uword in_n_cols)
302 {
303 arma_extra_debug_sigprint( arma_str::format("in_n_rows = %d, in_n_cols = %d") % in_n_rows % in_n_cols );
304
305 if( (n_rows == in_n_rows) && (n_cols == in_n_cols) ) { return; }
306
307 bool err_state = false;
308 char* err_msg = nullptr;
309
310 const uhword t_vec_state = vec_state;
311 const uhword t_mem_state = mem_state;
312
313 arma_debug_set_error( err_state, err_msg, (t_mem_state == 3), "Mat::init(): size is fixed and hence cannot be changed" );
314
315 if(t_vec_state > 0)
316 {
317 if( (in_n_rows == 0) && (in_n_cols == 0) )
318 {
319 if(t_vec_state == 1) { in_n_cols = 1; }
320 if(t_vec_state == 2) { in_n_rows = 1; }
321 }
322 else
323 {
324 if(t_vec_state == 1) { arma_debug_set_error( err_state, err_msg, (in_n_cols != 1), "Mat::init(): requested size is not compatible with column vector layout" ); }
325 if(t_vec_state == 2) { arma_debug_set_error( err_state, err_msg, (in_n_rows != 1), "Mat::init(): requested size is not compatible with row vector layout" ); }
326 }
327 }
328
329 // ensure that n_elem can hold the result of (n_rows * n_cols)
330
331 #if defined(ARMA_64BIT_WORD)
332 const char* error_message = "Mat::init(): requested size is too large";
333 #else
334 const char* error_message = "Mat::init(): requested size is too large; suggest to enable ARMA_64BIT_WORD";
335 #endif
336
337 arma_debug_set_error
338 (
339 err_state,
340 err_msg,
341 (
342 ( (in_n_rows > ARMA_MAX_UHWORD) || (in_n_cols > ARMA_MAX_UHWORD) )
343 ? ( (double(in_n_rows) * double(in_n_cols)) > double(ARMA_MAX_UWORD) )
344 : false
345 ),
346 error_message
347 );
348
349 arma_debug_check(err_state, err_msg);
350
351 const uword old_n_elem = n_elem;
352 const uword new_n_elem = in_n_rows * in_n_cols;
353
354 if(old_n_elem == new_n_elem)
355 {
356 arma_extra_debug_print("Mat::init(): reusing memory");
357 access::rw(n_rows) = in_n_rows;
358 access::rw(n_cols) = in_n_cols;
359 return;
360 }
361
362 arma_debug_check( (t_mem_state == 2), "Mat::init(): mismatch between size of auxiliary memory and requested size" );
363
364 if(new_n_elem <= arma_config::mat_prealloc)
365 {
366 if(n_alloc > 0)
367 {
368 arma_extra_debug_print("Mat::init(): releasing memory");
369 memory::release( access::rw(mem) );
370 }
371
372 if(new_n_elem > 0) { arma_extra_debug_print("Mat::init(): using local memory"); }
373
374 access::rw(mem) = (new_n_elem == 0) ? nullptr : mem_local;
375 access::rw(n_alloc) = 0;
376 }
377 else // condition: new_n_elem > arma_config::mat_prealloc
378 {
379 if(new_n_elem > n_alloc)
380 {
381 if(n_alloc > 0)
382 {
383 arma_extra_debug_print("Mat::init(): releasing memory");
384 memory::release( access::rw(mem) );
385
386 // in case memory::acquire() throws an exception
387 access::rw(mem) = nullptr;
388 access::rw(n_rows) = 0;
389 access::rw(n_cols) = 0;
390 access::rw(n_elem) = 0;
391 access::rw(n_alloc) = 0;
392 }
393
394 arma_extra_debug_print("Mat::init(): acquiring memory");
395 access::rw(mem) = memory::acquire<eT>(new_n_elem);
396 access::rw(n_alloc) = new_n_elem;
397 }
398 else // condition: new_n_elem <= n_alloc
399 {
400 arma_extra_debug_print("Mat::init(): reusing memory");
401 }
402 }
403
404 access::rw(n_rows) = in_n_rows;
405 access::rw(n_cols) = in_n_cols;
406 access::rw(n_elem) = new_n_elem;
407 access::rw(mem_state) = 0;
408 }
409
410
411
413template<typename eT>
414inline
415arma_cold
416Mat<eT>::Mat(const char* text)
417 : n_rows(0)
418 , n_cols(0)
419 , n_elem(0)
420 , n_alloc(0)
421 , vec_state(0)
422 , mem_state(0)
423 , mem()
424 {
425 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
426
427 init( std::string(text) );
428 }
429
430
431
433template<typename eT>
434inline
435arma_cold
436Mat<eT>&
437Mat<eT>::operator=(const char* text)
438 {
439 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
440
441 init( std::string(text) );
442
443 return *this;
444 }

449template<typename eT>
450inline
451arma_cold
452Mat<eT>::Mat(const std::string& text)
453 : n_rows(0)
454 , n_cols(0)
455 , n_elem(0)
456 , n_alloc(0)
457 , vec_state(0)
458 , mem_state(0)
459 , mem()
460 {
461 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
462
463 init(text);
464 }
465
466
467
469template<typename eT>
470inline
471arma_cold
472Mat<eT>&
473Mat<eT>::operator=(const std::string& text)
474 {
475 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
476
477 init(text);
478
479 return *this;
480 }
481
482
483
485template<typename eT>
486inline
487arma_cold
488void
489Mat<eT>::init(const std::string& text_orig)
490 {
491 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
492
493 const bool replace_commas = (is_cx<eT>::yes) ? false : ( text_orig.find(',') != std::string::npos );
494
495 std::string text_mod;
496
497 if(replace_commas) { text_mod = text_orig; std::replace(text_mod.begin(), text_mod.end(), ',', ' '); }
498
499 const std::string& text = (replace_commas) ? text_mod : text_orig;
500
501 //
502 // work out the size
503
504 uword t_n_rows = 0;
505 uword t_n_cols = 0;
506
507 bool has_semicolon = false;
508 bool has_token = false;
509
510 std::string token;
511
512 std::string::size_type line_start = 0;
513 std::string::size_type line_end = 0;
514 std::string::size_type line_len = 0;
515
516 std::stringstream line_stream;
517
518 while( line_start < text.length() )
519 {
520 line_end = text.find(';', line_start);
521
522 if(line_end == std::string::npos)
523 {
524 has_semicolon = false;
525 line_end = text.length()-1;
526 line_len = line_end - line_start + 1;
527 }
528 else
529 {
530 has_semicolon = true;
531 line_len = line_end - line_start; // omit the ';' character
532 }
533
534 line_stream.clear();
535 line_stream.str( text.substr(line_start,line_len) );
536
537 has_token = false;
538
539 uword line_n_cols = 0;
540
541 while(line_stream >> token) { has_token = true; ++line_n_cols; }
542
543 if(t_n_rows == 0)
544 {
545 t_n_cols = line_n_cols;
546 }
547 else
548 {
549 if(has_semicolon || has_token) { arma_check( (line_n_cols != t_n_cols), "Mat::init(): inconsistent number of columns in given string"); }
550 }
551
552 ++t_n_rows;
553
554 line_start = line_end+1;
555 }
556
557 // if the last line was empty, ignore it
558 if( (has_semicolon == false) && (has_token == false) && (t_n_rows >= 1) ) { --t_n_rows; }
559
560 Mat<eT>& x = (*this);
561 x.set_size(t_n_rows, t_n_cols);
562
563 if(x.is_empty()) { return; }
564
565 line_start = 0;
566 line_end = 0;
567 line_len = 0;
568
569 uword urow = 0;
570
571 while( line_start < text.length() )
572 {
573 line_end = text.find(';', line_start);
574
575 if(line_end == std::string::npos)
576 {
577 line_end = text.length()-1;
578 line_len = line_end - line_start + 1;
579 }
580 else
581 {
582 line_len = line_end - line_start; // omit the ';' character
583 }
584
585 line_stream.clear();
586 line_stream.str( text.substr(line_start,line_len) );
587
588 uword ucol = 0;
589 while(line_stream >> token)
590 {
591 diskio::convert_token( x.at(urow,ucol), token );
592 ++ucol;
593 }
594
595 ++urow;
596 line_start = line_end+1;
597 }
598 }
599
600
601
603template<typename eT>
604inline
605Mat<eT>::Mat(const std::vector<eT>& x)
606 : n_rows(uword(x.size()))
607 , n_cols(1)
608 , n_elem(uword(x.size()))
609 , n_alloc()
610 , vec_state(0)
611 , mem_state(0)
612 , mem()
613 {
614 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
615
616 init_cold();
617
618 if(n_elem > 0) { arrayops::copy( memptr(), &(x[0]), n_elem ); }
619 }
620
621
622
624template<typename eT>
625inline
626Mat<eT>&
627Mat<eT>::operator=(const std::vector<eT>& x)
628 {
629 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
630
631 init_warm(uword(x.size()), 1);
632
633 if(x.size() > 0) { arrayops::copy( memptr(), &(x[0]), uword(x.size()) ); }
634
635 return *this;
636 }
637
638

640template<typename eT>
641inline
642Mat<eT>::Mat(const std::initializer_list<eT>& list)
643 : n_rows(0)
644 , n_cols(0)
645 , n_elem(0)
646 , n_alloc(0)
647 , vec_state(0)
648 , mem_state(0)
649 , mem()
650 {
651 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
652
653 init(list);
654 }
655

658template<typename eT>
659inline
660Mat<eT>&
661Mat<eT>::operator=(const std::initializer_list<eT>& list)
662 {
663 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
664
665 init(list);
666
667 return *this;
668 }

671
672template<typename eT>
673inline
674Mat<eT>::Mat(const std::initializer_list< std::initializer_list<eT> >& list)
675 : n_rows(0)
676 , n_cols(0)
677 , n_elem(0)
678 , n_alloc(0)
679 , vec_state(0)
680 , mem_state(0)
681 , mem()
682 {
683 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
684
685 init(list);
686 }
687
688
689
690template<typename eT>
691inline
692Mat<eT>&
693Mat<eT>::operator=(const std::initializer_list< std::initializer_list<eT> >& list)
694 {
695 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
696
697 init(list);
698
699 return *this;
700 }
701
702
703
704template<typename eT>
705inline
706Mat<eT>::Mat(Mat<eT>&& X)
707 : n_rows (X.n_rows )
708 , n_cols (X.n_cols )
709 , n_elem (X.n_elem )
710 , n_alloc (X.n_alloc)
711 , vec_state(0 )
712 , mem_state(0 )
713 , mem ( )
714 {
715 arma_extra_debug_sigprint(arma_str::format("this = %x X = %x") % this % &X);
716
717 if( (X.n_alloc > arma_config::mat_prealloc) || (X.mem_state == 1) || (X.mem_state == 2) )
718 {
719 access::rw(mem_state) = X.mem_state;
720 access::rw(mem) = X.mem;
721
722 access::rw(X.n_rows) = 0;
723 access::rw(X.n_cols) = 0;
724 access::rw(X.n_elem) = 0;
725 access::rw(X.n_alloc) = 0;
726 access::rw(X.mem_state) = 0;
727 access::rw(X.mem) = nullptr;
728 }
729 else // condition: (X.n_alloc <= arma_config::mat_prealloc) || (X.mem_state == 0) || (X.mem_state == 3)
730 {
731 init_cold();
732
733 arrayops::copy( memptr(), X.mem, X.n_elem );
734
735 if( (X.mem_state == 0) && (X.n_alloc <= arma_config::mat_prealloc) )
736 {
737 access::rw(X.n_rows) = 0;
738 access::rw(X.n_cols) = 0;
739 access::rw(X.n_elem) = 0;
740 access::rw(X.mem) = nullptr;
741 }
742 }
743 }
744
745
746
747template<typename eT>
748inline
749Mat<eT>&
750Mat<eT>::operator=(Mat<eT>&& X)
751 {
752 arma_extra_debug_sigprint(arma_str::format("this = %x X = %x") % this % &X);
753
754 (*this).steal_mem(X);
755
756 if( (X.mem_state == 0) && (X.n_alloc <= arma_config::mat_prealloc) && (this != &X) )
757 {
758 access::rw(X.n_rows) = 0;
759 access::rw(X.n_cols) = 0;
760 access::rw(X.n_elem) = 0;
761 access::rw(X.mem) = nullptr;
762 }
763
764 return *this;
765 }
766
767
768
771template<typename eT>
772inline
773Mat<eT>&
774Mat<eT>::operator=(const eT val)
775 {
776 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
777
778 init_warm(1,1);
779
780 access::rw(mem[0]) = val;
781
782 return *this;
783 }
784
785
786
788template<typename eT>
789inline
790Mat<eT>&
791Mat<eT>::operator+=(const eT val)
792 {
793 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
794
795 arrayops::inplace_plus( memptr(), val, n_elem );
796
797 return *this;
798 }
799
800
801
803template<typename eT>
804inline
805Mat<eT>&
806Mat<eT>::operator-=(const eT val)
807 {
808 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
809
810 arrayops::inplace_minus( memptr(), val, n_elem );
811
812 return *this;
813 }
814
815
816
818template<typename eT>
819inline
820Mat<eT>&
821Mat<eT>::operator*=(const eT val)
822 {
823 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
824
825 arrayops::inplace_mul( memptr(), val, n_elem );
826
827 return *this;
828 }
829
830
831
833template<typename eT>
834inline
835Mat<eT>&
836Mat<eT>::operator/=(const eT val)
837 {
838 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
839
840 arrayops::inplace_div( memptr(), val, n_elem );
841
842 return *this;
843 }
844
845
846
848template<typename eT>
849inline
850Mat<eT>::Mat(const Mat<eT>& in_mat)
851 : n_rows(in_mat.n_rows)
852 , n_cols(in_mat.n_cols)
853 , n_elem(in_mat.n_elem)
854 , n_alloc()
855 , vec_state(0)
856 , mem_state(0)
857 , mem()
858 {
859 arma_extra_debug_sigprint(arma_str::format("this = %x in_mat = %x") % this % &in_mat);
860
861 init_cold();
862
863 arrayops::copy( memptr(), in_mat.mem, in_mat.n_elem );
864 }
865
866
867
869template<typename eT>
870inline
871Mat<eT>&
872Mat<eT>::operator=(const Mat<eT>& in_mat)
873 {
874 arma_extra_debug_sigprint(arma_str::format("this = %x in_mat = %x") % this % &in_mat);
875
876 if(this != &in_mat)
877 {
878 init_warm(in_mat.n_rows, in_mat.n_cols);
879
880 arrayops::copy( memptr(), in_mat.mem, in_mat.n_elem );
881 }
882
883 return *this;
884 }
885
886
887
888template<typename eT>
889inline
890void
891Mat<eT>::init(const std::initializer_list<eT>& list)
892 {
893 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
894
895 const uword N = uword(list.size());
896
897 set_size(1, N);
898
899 arrayops::copy( memptr(), list.begin(), N );
900 }
901
902
903
904template<typename eT>
905inline
906void
907Mat<eT>::init(const std::initializer_list< std::initializer_list<eT> >& list)
908 {
909 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
910
911 uword x_n_rows = uword(list.size());
912 uword x_n_cols = 0;
913
914 auto it = list.begin();
915 auto it_end = list.end();
916
917 for(; it != it_end; ++it) { x_n_cols = (std::max)(x_n_cols, uword((*it).size())); }
918
919 Mat<eT>& t = (*this);
920
921 if(t.mem_state == 3)
922 {
923 arma_debug_check( ((x_n_rows != t.n_rows) || (x_n_cols != t.n_cols)), "Mat::init(): size mismatch between fixed size matrix and initialiser list" );
924 }
925 else
926 {
927 t.set_size(x_n_rows, x_n_cols);
928 }
929
930 uword row_num = 0;
931
932 auto row_it = list.begin();
933 auto row_it_end = list.end();
934
935 for(; row_it != row_it_end; ++row_it)
936 {
937 uword col_num = 0;
938
939 auto col_it = (*row_it).begin();
940 auto col_it_end = (*row_it).end();
941
942 for(; col_it != col_it_end; ++col_it)
943 {
944 t.at(row_num, col_num) = (*col_it);
945 ++col_num;
946 }
947
948 for(uword c=col_num; c < x_n_cols; ++c)
949 {
950 t.at(row_num, c) = eT(0);
951 }
952
953 ++row_num;
954 }
955 }
956
957
958
960template<typename eT>
961template<typename T1, typename T2>
962inline
963void
964Mat<eT>::init
965 (
966 const Base<typename Mat<eT>::pod_type, T1>& X,
967 const Base<typename Mat<eT>::pod_type, T2>& Y
968 )
969 {
970 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
971
972 typedef typename T1::elem_type T;
973
974 arma_type_check(( is_cx<eT>::no ));
975 arma_type_check(( is_cx< T>::yes ));
976
977 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< std::complex<T>, eT >::no ));
978
979 const Proxy<T1> PX(X.get_ref());
980 const Proxy<T2> PY(Y.get_ref());
981
982 arma_debug_assert_same_size(PX, PY, "Mat()");
983
984 const uword local_n_rows = PX.get_n_rows();
985 const uword local_n_cols = PX.get_n_cols();
986
987 init_warm(local_n_rows, local_n_cols);
988
989 eT* out_mem = (*this).memptr();
990
991 const bool use_at = ( Proxy<T1>::use_at || Proxy<T2>::use_at );
992
993 if(use_at == false)
994 {
995 typedef typename Proxy<T1>::ea_type ea_type1;
996 typedef typename Proxy<T2>::ea_type ea_type2;
997
998 const uword N = n_elem;
999
1000 ea_type1 A = PX.get_ea();
1001 ea_type2 B = PY.get_ea();
1002
1003 for(uword ii=0; ii < N; ++ii)
1004 {
1005 out_mem[ii] = std::complex<T>(A[ii], B[ii]);
1006 }
1007 }
1008 else
1009 {
1010 for(uword ucol=0; ucol < local_n_cols; ++ucol)
1011 for(uword urow=0; urow < local_n_rows; ++urow)
1012 {
1013 *out_mem = std::complex<T>(PX.at(urow,ucol), PY.at(urow,ucol));
1014 out_mem++;
1015 }
1016 }
1017 }
1018
1019
1020
1022template<typename eT>
1023inline
1024void
1025Mat<eT>::swap(Mat<eT>& B)
1026 {
1027 Mat<eT>& A = (*this);
1028
1029 arma_extra_debug_sigprint(arma_str::format("A = %x B = %x") % &A % &B);
1030
1031 bool layout_ok = false;
1032
1033 if(A.vec_state == B.vec_state)
1034 {
1035 layout_ok = true;
1036 }
1037 else
1038 {
1039 const uhword A_vec_state = A.vec_state;
1040 const uhword B_vec_state = B.vec_state;
1041
1042 const bool A_absorbs_B = (A_vec_state == 0) || ( (A_vec_state == 1) && (B.n_cols == 1) ) || ( (A_vec_state == 2) && (B.n_rows == 1) );
1043 const bool B_absorbs_A = (B_vec_state == 0) || ( (B_vec_state == 1) && (A.n_cols == 1) ) || ( (B_vec_state == 2) && (A.n_rows == 1) );
1044
1045 layout_ok = A_absorbs_B && B_absorbs_A;
1046 }
1047
1048 const uhword A_mem_state = A.mem_state;
1049 const uhword B_mem_state = B.mem_state;
1050
1051 if( (A_mem_state == 0) && (B_mem_state == 0) && layout_ok )
1052 {
1053 const uword A_n_elem = A.n_elem;
1054 const uword B_n_elem = B.n_elem;
1055
1056 const bool A_use_local_mem = (A.n_alloc <= arma_config::mat_prealloc);
1057 const bool B_use_local_mem = (B.n_alloc <= arma_config::mat_prealloc);
1058
1059 if( (A_use_local_mem == false) && (B_use_local_mem == false) )
1060 {
1061 std::swap( access::rw(A.mem), access::rw(B.mem) );
1062 }
1063 else
1064 if( (A_use_local_mem == true) && (B_use_local_mem == true) )
1065 {
1066 eT* A_mem_local = &(A.mem_local[0]);
1067 eT* B_mem_local = &(B.mem_local[0]);
1068
1069 access::rw(A.mem) = A_mem_local;
1070 access::rw(B.mem) = B_mem_local;
1071
1072 const uword N = (std::max)(A_n_elem, B_n_elem);
1073
1074 for(uword ii=0; ii < N; ++ii) { std::swap( A_mem_local[ii], B_mem_local[ii] ); }
1075 }
1076 else
1077 if( (A_use_local_mem == true) && (B_use_local_mem == false) )
1078 {
1079 eT* A_mem_local = &(A.mem_local[0]);
1080 eT* B_mem_local = &(B.mem_local[0]);
1081
1082 arrayops::copy(B_mem_local, A_mem_local, A_n_elem);
1083
1084 access::rw(A.mem) = B.mem;
1085 access::rw(B.mem) = B_mem_local;
1086 }
1087 else
1088 if( (A_use_local_mem == false) && (B_use_local_mem == true) )
1089 {
1090 eT* A_mem_local = &(A.mem_local[0]);
1091 eT* B_mem_local = &(B.mem_local[0]);
1092
1093 arrayops::copy(A_mem_local, B_mem_local, B_n_elem);
1094
1095 access::rw(B.mem) = A.mem;
1096 access::rw(A.mem) = A_mem_local;
1097 }
1098
1099 std::swap( access::rw(A.n_rows), access::rw(B.n_rows) );
1100 std::swap( access::rw(A.n_cols), access::rw(B.n_cols) );
1101 std::swap( access::rw(A.n_elem), access::rw(B.n_elem) );
1102 std::swap( access::rw(A.n_alloc), access::rw(B.n_alloc) );
1103 }
1104 else
1105 if( (A_mem_state <= 2) && (B_mem_state <= 2) && (A.n_elem == B.n_elem) && layout_ok )
1106 {
1107 std::swap( access::rw(A.n_rows), access::rw(B.n_rows) );
1108 std::swap( access::rw(A.n_cols), access::rw(B.n_cols) );
1109
1110 const uword N = A.n_elem;
1111
1112 eT* A_mem = A.memptr();
1113 eT* B_mem = B.memptr();
1114
1115 for(uword ii=0; ii < N; ++ii) { std::swap(A_mem[ii], B_mem[ii]); }
1116 }
1117 else
1118 if( (A.n_rows == B.n_rows) && (A.n_cols == B.n_cols) )
1119 {
1120 const uword N = A.n_elem;
1121
1122 eT* A_mem = A.memptr();
1123 eT* B_mem = B.memptr();
1124
1125 for(uword ii=0; ii < N; ++ii) { std::swap(A_mem[ii], B_mem[ii]); }
1126 }
1127 else
1128 {
1129 // generic swap to handle remaining cases
1130
1131 if(A.n_elem <= B.n_elem)
1132 {
1133 Mat<eT> C = A;
1134
1135 A.steal_mem(B);
1136 B.steal_mem(C);
1137 }
1138 else
1139 {
1140 Mat<eT> C = B;
1141
1142 B.steal_mem(A);
1143 A.steal_mem(C);
1144 }
1145 }
1146 }
1147
1148
1149
1152template<typename eT>
1153inline
1154void
1155Mat<eT>::steal_mem(Mat<eT>& x)
1156 {
1157 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
1158
1159 if(this == &x) { return; }
1160
1161 const uword x_n_rows = x.n_rows;
1162 const uword x_n_cols = x.n_cols;
1163 const uword x_n_elem = x.n_elem;
1164 const uword x_n_alloc = x.n_alloc;
1165 const uhword x_vec_state = x.vec_state;
1166 const uhword x_mem_state = x.mem_state;
1167
1168 const uhword t_vec_state = vec_state;
1169 const uhword t_mem_state = mem_state;
1170
1171 const bool layout_ok = (t_vec_state == x_vec_state) || ((t_vec_state == 1) && (x_n_cols == 1)) || ((t_vec_state == 2) && (x_n_rows == 1));
1172
1173 if( layout_ok && (t_mem_state <= 1) && ((x_n_alloc > arma_config::mat_prealloc) || (x_mem_state == 1)) )
1174 {
1175 reset();
1176
1177 access::rw(n_rows) = x_n_rows;
1178 access::rw(n_cols) = x_n_cols;
1179 access::rw(n_elem) = x_n_elem;
1180 access::rw(n_alloc) = x_n_alloc;
1181 access::rw(mem_state) = x_mem_state;
1182 access::rw(mem) = x.mem;
1183
1184 access::rw(x.n_rows) = 0;
1185 access::rw(x.n_cols) = 0;
1186 access::rw(x.n_elem) = 0;
1187 access::rw(x.n_alloc) = 0;
1188 access::rw(x.mem_state) = 0;
1189 access::rw(x.mem) = nullptr;
1190 }
1191 else
1192 {
1193 (*this).operator=(x);
1194 }
1195 }
1196
1197
1198
1199template<typename eT>
1200inline
1201void
1202Mat<eT>::steal_mem_col(Mat<eT>& x, const uword max_n_rows)
1203 {
1204 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
1205
1206 const uword x_n_elem = x.n_elem;
1207 const uword x_n_alloc = x.n_alloc;
1208 const uhword x_mem_state = x.mem_state;
1209
1210 const uhword t_vec_state = vec_state;
1211 const uhword t_mem_state = mem_state;
1212
1213 const uword alt_n_rows = (std::min)(x.n_rows, max_n_rows);
1214
1215 if((x_n_elem == 0) || (alt_n_rows == 0))
1216 {
1217 (*this).set_size(0,1);
1218
1219 return;
1220 }
1221
1222 if( (this != &x) && (t_vec_state <= 1) && (t_mem_state <= 1) && (x_mem_state <= 1) )
1223 {
1224 if( (x_mem_state == 0) && ((x_n_alloc <= arma_config::mat_prealloc) || (alt_n_rows <= arma_config::mat_prealloc)) )
1225 {
1226 (*this).set_size(alt_n_rows, uword(1));
1227
1228 arrayops::copy( (*this).memptr(), x.memptr(), alt_n_rows );
1229 }
1230 else
1231 {
1232 reset();
1233
1234 access::rw(n_rows) = alt_n_rows;
1235 access::rw(n_cols) = 1;
1236 access::rw(n_elem) = alt_n_rows;
1237 access::rw(n_alloc) = x_n_alloc;
1238 access::rw(mem_state) = x_mem_state;
1239 access::rw(mem) = x.mem;
1240
1241 access::rw(x.n_rows) = 0;
1242 access::rw(x.n_cols) = 0;
1243 access::rw(x.n_elem) = 0;
1244 access::rw(x.n_alloc) = 0;
1245 access::rw(x.mem_state) = 0;
1246 access::rw(x.mem) = nullptr;
1247 }
1248 }
1249 else
1250 {
1251 Mat<eT> tmp(alt_n_rows, 1, arma_nozeros_indicator());
1252
1253 arrayops::copy( tmp.memptr(), x.memptr(), alt_n_rows );
1254
1255 steal_mem(tmp);
1256 }
1257 }
1258
1259
1260
1265
1266template<typename eT>
1267inline
1268Mat<eT>::Mat(eT* aux_mem, const uword aux_n_rows, const uword aux_n_cols, const bool copy_aux_mem, const bool strict)
1269 : n_rows ( aux_n_rows )
1270 , n_cols ( aux_n_cols )
1271 , n_elem ( aux_n_rows*aux_n_cols )
1272 , n_alloc ( 0 )
1273 , vec_state( 0 )
1274 , mem_state( copy_aux_mem ? 0 : ( strict ? 2 : 1 ) )
1275 , mem ( copy_aux_mem ? nullptr : aux_mem )
1276 {
1277 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
1278
1279 if(copy_aux_mem)
1280 {
1281 init_cold();
1282
1283 arrayops::copy( memptr(), aux_mem, n_elem );
1284 }
1285 }
1286
1287
1288
1291template<typename eT>
1292inline
1293Mat<eT>::Mat(const eT* aux_mem, const uword aux_n_rows, const uword aux_n_cols)
1294 : n_rows(aux_n_rows)
1295 , n_cols(aux_n_cols)
1296 , n_elem(aux_n_rows*aux_n_cols)
1297 , n_alloc()
1298 , vec_state(0)
1299 , mem_state(0)
1300 , mem()
1301 {
1302 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
1303
1304 init_cold();
1305
1306 arrayops::copy( memptr(), aux_mem, n_elem );
1307 }
1308
1309
1310
1314
1315template<typename eT>
1316inline
1317Mat<eT>::Mat(const char junk, const eT* aux_mem, const uword aux_n_rows, const uword aux_n_cols)
1318 : n_rows (aux_n_rows )
1319 , n_cols (aux_n_cols )
1320 , n_elem (aux_n_rows*aux_n_cols)
1321 , n_alloc (0 )
1322 , vec_state(0 )
1323 , mem_state(3 )
1324 , mem (aux_mem )
1325 {
1326 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
1327
1328 arma_ignore(junk);
1329 }
1330
1331
1332
1334template<typename eT>
1335inline
1336Mat<eT>&
1337Mat<eT>::operator+=(const Mat<eT>& m)
1338 {
1339 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
1340
1341 arma_debug_assert_same_size(*this, m, "addition");
1342
1343 arrayops::inplace_plus( memptr(), m.memptr(), n_elem );
1344
1345 return *this;
1346 }
1347
1348
1349
1351template<typename eT>
1352inline
1353Mat<eT>&
1354Mat<eT>::operator-=(const Mat<eT>& m)
1355 {
1356 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
1357
1358 arma_debug_assert_same_size(*this, m, "subtraction");
1359
1360 arrayops::inplace_minus( memptr(), m.memptr(), n_elem );
1361
1362 return *this;
1363 }
1364
1365
1366
1368template<typename eT>
1369inline
1370Mat<eT>&
1371Mat<eT>::operator*=(const Mat<eT>& m)
1372 {
1373 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
1374
1375 glue_times::apply_inplace(*this, m);
1376
1377 return *this;
1378 }
1379
1380
1381
1383template<typename eT>
1384inline
1385Mat<eT>&
1386Mat<eT>::operator%=(const Mat<eT>& m)
1387 {
1388 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
1389
1390 arma_debug_assert_same_size(*this, m, "element-wise multiplication");
1391
1392 arrayops::inplace_mul( memptr(), m.memptr(), n_elem );
1393
1394 return *this;
1395 }
1396
1397
1398
1400template<typename eT>
1401inline
1402Mat<eT>&
1403Mat<eT>::operator/=(const Mat<eT>& m)
1404 {
1405 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
1406
1407 arma_debug_assert_same_size(*this, m, "element-wise division");
1408
1409 arrayops::inplace_div( memptr(), m.memptr(), n_elem );
1410
1411 return *this;
1412 }
1413
1414
1415
1416template<typename eT>
1417template<typename T1>
1418inline
1419Mat<eT>::Mat(const BaseCube<eT,T1>& X)
1420 : n_rows(0)
1421 , n_cols(0)
1422 , n_elem(0)
1423 , n_alloc(0)
1424 , vec_state(0)
1425 , mem_state(0)
1426 , mem()
1427 {
1428 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
1429
1430 (*this).operator=(X);
1431 }
1432
1433
1434
1435template<typename eT>
1436template<typename T1>
1437inline
1438Mat<eT>&
1439Mat<eT>::operator=(const BaseCube<eT,T1>& X)
1440 {
1441 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
1442
1443 Mat<eT>& out = *this;
1444
1445 const unwrap_cube<T1> tmp(X.get_ref());
1446 const Cube<eT>& in = tmp.M;
1447
1448 arma_debug_assert_cube_as_mat(out, in, "copy into matrix", false);
1449
1450 const uword in_n_rows = in.n_rows;
1451 const uword in_n_cols = in.n_cols;
1452 const uword in_n_slices = in.n_slices;
1453
1454 const uword out_vec_state = out.vec_state;
1455
1456 if(in_n_slices == 1)
1457 {
1458 out.set_size(in_n_rows, in_n_cols);
1459
1460 for(uword ucol=0; ucol < in_n_cols; ++ucol)
1461 {
1462 arrayops::copy( out.colptr(ucol), in.slice_colptr(0, ucol), in_n_rows );
1463 }
1464 }
1465 else
1466 {
1467 if(out_vec_state == 0)
1468 {
1469 if(in_n_cols == 1)
1470 {
1471 out.set_size(in_n_rows, in_n_slices);
1472
1473 for(uword i=0; i < in_n_slices; ++i)
1474 {
1475 arrayops::copy( out.colptr(i), in.slice_colptr(i, 0), in_n_rows );
1476 }
1477 }
1478 else
1479 if(in_n_rows == 1)
1480 {
1481 out.set_size(in_n_cols, in_n_slices);
1482
1483 for(uword slice=0; slice < in_n_slices; ++slice)
1484 {
1485 eT* out_colptr = out.colptr(slice);
1486
1487 uword i,j;
1488 for(i=0, j=1; j < in_n_cols; i+=2, j+=2)
1489 {
1490 const eT tmp_i = in.at(0, i, slice);
1491 const eT tmp_j = in.at(0, j, slice);
1492
1493 out_colptr[i] = tmp_i;
1494 out_colptr[j] = tmp_j;
1495 }
1496
1497 if(i < in_n_cols)
1498 {
1499 out_colptr[i] = in.at(0, i, slice);
1500 }
1501 }
1502 }
1503 }
1504 else
1505 {
1506 out.set_size(in_n_slices);
1507
1508 eT* out_mem = out.memptr();
1509
1510 for(uword i=0; i<in_n_slices; ++i)
1511 {
1512 out_mem[i] = in.at(0, 0, i);
1513 }
1514 }
1515 }
1516
1517 return *this;
1518 }
1519
1520
1521
1522template<typename eT>
1523template<typename T1>
1524inline
1525Mat<eT>&
1526Mat<eT>::operator+=(const BaseCube<eT,T1>& X)
1527 {
1528 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
1529
1530 Mat<eT>& out = *this;
1531
1532 const unwrap_cube<T1> tmp(X.get_ref());
1533 const Cube<eT>& in = tmp.M;
1534
1535 arma_debug_assert_cube_as_mat(out, in, "addition", true);
1536
1537 const uword in_n_rows = in.n_rows;
1538 const uword in_n_cols = in.n_cols;
1539 const uword in_n_slices = in.n_slices;
1540
1541 const uword out_n_rows = out.n_rows;
1542 const uword out_n_cols = out.n_cols;
1543 const uword out_vec_state = out.vec_state;
1544
1545 if(in_n_slices == 1)
1546 {
1547 for(uword ucol=0; ucol < in_n_cols; ++ucol)
1548 {
1549 arrayops::inplace_plus( out.colptr(ucol), in.slice_colptr(0, ucol), in_n_rows );
1550 }
1551 }
1552 else
1553 {
1554 if(out_vec_state == 0)
1555 {
1556 if( (in_n_rows == out_n_rows) && (in_n_cols == 1) && (in_n_slices == out_n_cols) )
1557 {
1558 for(uword i=0; i < in_n_slices; ++i)
1559 {
1560 arrayops::inplace_plus( out.colptr(i), in.slice_colptr(i, 0), in_n_rows );
1561 }
1562 }
1563 else
1564 if( (in_n_rows == 1) && (in_n_cols == out_n_rows) && (in_n_slices == out_n_cols) )
1565 {
1566 for(uword slice=0; slice < in_n_slices; ++slice)
1567 {
1568 eT* out_colptr = out.colptr(slice);
1569
1570 uword i,j;
1571 for(i=0, j=1; j < in_n_cols; i+=2, j+=2)
1572 {
1573 const eT tmp_i = in.at(0, i, slice);
1574 const eT tmp_j = in.at(0, j, slice);
1575
1576 out_colptr[i] += tmp_i;
1577 out_colptr[j] += tmp_j;
1578 }
1579
1580 if(i < in_n_cols)
1581 {
1582 out_colptr[i] += in.at(0, i, slice);
1583 }
1584 }
1585 }
1586 }
1587 else
1588 {
1589 eT* out_mem = out.memptr();
1590
1591 for(uword i=0; i<in_n_slices; ++i)
1592 {
1593 out_mem[i] += in.at(0, 0, i);
1594 }
1595 }
1596 }
1597
1598 return *this;
1599 }
1600
1601
1602
1603template<typename eT>
1604template<typename T1>
1605inline
1606Mat<eT>&
1607Mat<eT>::operator-=(const BaseCube<eT,T1>& X)
1608 {
1609 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
1610
1611 Mat<eT>& out = *this;
1612
1613 const unwrap_cube<T1> tmp(X.get_ref());
1614 const Cube<eT>& in = tmp.M;
1615
1616 arma_debug_assert_cube_as_mat(out, in, "subtraction", true);
1617
1618 const uword in_n_rows = in.n_rows;
1619 const uword in_n_cols = in.n_cols;
1620 const uword in_n_slices = in.n_slices;
1621
1622 const uword out_n_rows = out.n_rows;
1623 const uword out_n_cols = out.n_cols;
1624 const uword out_vec_state = out.vec_state;
1625
1626 if(in_n_slices == 1)
1627 {
1628 for(uword ucol=0; ucol < in_n_cols; ++ucol)
1629 {
1630 arrayops::inplace_minus( out.colptr(ucol), in.slice_colptr(0, ucol), in_n_rows );
1631 }
1632 }
1633 else
1634 {
1635 if(out_vec_state == 0)
1636 {
1637 if( (in_n_rows == out_n_rows) && (in_n_cols == 1) && (in_n_slices == out_n_cols) )
1638 {
1639 for(uword i=0; i < in_n_slices; ++i)
1640 {
1641 arrayops::inplace_minus( out.colptr(i), in.slice_colptr(i, 0), in_n_rows );
1642 }
1643 }
1644 else
1645 if( (in_n_rows == 1) && (in_n_cols == out_n_rows) && (in_n_slices == out_n_cols) )
1646 {
1647 for(uword slice=0; slice < in_n_slices; ++slice)
1648 {
1649 eT* out_colptr = out.colptr(slice);
1650
1651 uword i,j;
1652 for(i=0, j=1; j < in_n_cols; i+=2, j+=2)
1653 {
1654 const eT tmp_i = in.at(0, i, slice);
1655 const eT tmp_j = in.at(0, j, slice);
1656
1657 out_colptr[i] -= tmp_i;
1658 out_colptr[j] -= tmp_j;
1659 }
1660
1661 if(i < in_n_cols)
1662 {
1663 out_colptr[i] -= in.at(0, i, slice);
1664 }
1665 }
1666 }
1667 }
1668 else
1669 {
1670 eT* out_mem = out.memptr();
1671
1672 for(uword i=0; i<in_n_slices; ++i)
1673 {
1674 out_mem[i] -= in.at(0, 0, i);
1675 }
1676 }
1677 }
1678
1679 return *this;
1680 }
1681
1682
1683
1684template<typename eT>
1685template<typename T1>
1686inline
1687Mat<eT>&
1688Mat<eT>::operator*=(const BaseCube<eT,T1>& X)
1689 {
1690 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
1691
1692 const Mat<eT> B(X);
1693
1694 (*this).operator*=(B);
1695
1696 return *this;
1697 }
1698
1699
1700
1701template<typename eT>
1702template<typename T1>
1703inline
1704Mat<eT>&
1705Mat<eT>::operator%=(const BaseCube<eT,T1>& X)
1706 {
1707 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
1708
1709 Mat<eT>& out = *this;
1710
1711 const unwrap_cube<T1> tmp(X.get_ref());
1712 const Cube<eT>& in = tmp.M;
1713
1714 arma_debug_assert_cube_as_mat(out, in, "element-wise multiplication", true);
1715
1716 const uword in_n_rows = in.n_rows;
1717 const uword in_n_cols = in.n_cols;
1718 const uword in_n_slices = in.n_slices;
1719
1720 const uword out_n_rows = out.n_rows;
1721 const uword out_n_cols = out.n_cols;
1722 const uword out_vec_state = out.vec_state;
1723
1724 if(in_n_slices == 1)
1725 {
1726 for(uword ucol=0; ucol < in_n_cols; ++ucol)
1727 {
1728 arrayops::inplace_mul( out.colptr(ucol), in.slice_colptr(0, ucol), in_n_rows );
1729 }
1730 }
1731 else
1732 {
1733 if(out_vec_state == 0)
1734 {
1735 if( (in_n_rows == out_n_rows) && (in_n_cols == 1) && (in_n_slices == out_n_cols) )
1736 {
1737 for(uword i=0; i < in_n_slices; ++i)
1738 {
1739 arrayops::inplace_mul( out.colptr(i), in.slice_colptr(i, 0), in_n_rows );
1740 }
1741 }
1742 else
1743 if( (in_n_rows == 1) && (in_n_cols == out_n_rows) && (in_n_slices == out_n_cols) )
1744 {
1745 for(uword slice=0; slice < in_n_slices; ++slice)
1746 {
1747 eT* out_colptr = out.colptr(slice);
1748
1749 uword i,j;
1750 for(i=0, j=1; j < in_n_cols; i+=2, j+=2)
1751 {
1752 const eT tmp_i = in.at(0, i, slice);
1753 const eT tmp_j = in.at(0, j, slice);
1754
1755 out_colptr[i] *= tmp_i;
1756 out_colptr[j] *= tmp_j;
1757 }
1758
1759 if(i < in_n_cols)
1760 {
1761 out_colptr[i] *= in.at(0, i, slice);
1762 }
1763 }
1764 }
1765 }
1766 else
1767 {
1768 eT* out_mem = out.memptr();
1769
1770 for(uword i=0; i<in_n_slices; ++i)
1771 {
1772 out_mem[i] *= in.at(0, 0, i);
1773 }
1774 }
1775 }
1776
1777 return *this;
1778 }
1779
1780
1781
1782template<typename eT>
1783template<typename T1>
1784inline
1785Mat<eT>&
1786Mat<eT>::operator/=(const BaseCube<eT,T1>& X)
1787 {
1788 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
1789
1790 Mat<eT>& out = *this;
1791
1792 const unwrap_cube<T1> tmp(X.get_ref());
1793 const Cube<eT>& in = tmp.M;
1794
1795 arma_debug_assert_cube_as_mat(out, in, "element-wise division", true);
1796
1797 const uword in_n_rows = in.n_rows;
1798 const uword in_n_cols = in.n_cols;
1799 const uword in_n_slices = in.n_slices;
1800
1801 const uword out_n_rows = out.n_rows;
1802 const uword out_n_cols = out.n_cols;
1803 const uword out_vec_state = out.vec_state;
1804
1805 if(in_n_slices == 1)
1806 {
1807 for(uword ucol=0; ucol < in_n_cols; ++ucol)
1808 {
1809 arrayops::inplace_div( out.colptr(ucol), in.slice_colptr(0, ucol), in_n_rows );
1810 }
1811 }
1812 else
1813 {
1814 if(out_vec_state == 0)
1815 {
1816 if( (in_n_rows == out_n_rows) && (in_n_cols == 1) && (in_n_slices == out_n_cols) )
1817 {
1818 for(uword i=0; i < in_n_slices; ++i)
1819 {
1820 arrayops::inplace_div( out.colptr(i), in.slice_colptr(i, 0), in_n_rows );
1821 }
1822 }
1823 else
1824 if( (in_n_rows == 1) && (in_n_cols == out_n_rows) && (in_n_slices == out_n_cols) )
1825 {
1826 for(uword slice=0; slice < in_n_slices; ++slice)
1827 {
1828 eT* out_colptr = out.colptr(slice);
1829
1830 uword i,j;
1831 for(i=0, j=1; j < in_n_cols; i+=2, j+=2)
1832 {
1833 const eT tmp_i = in.at(0, i, slice);
1834 const eT tmp_j = in.at(0, j, slice);
1835
1836 out_colptr[i] /= tmp_i;
1837 out_colptr[j] /= tmp_j;
1838 }
1839
1840 if(i < in_n_cols)
1841 {
1842 out_colptr[i] /= in.at(0, i, slice);
1843 }
1844 }
1845 }
1846 }
1847 else
1848 {
1849 eT* out_mem = out.memptr();
1850
1851 for(uword i=0; i<in_n_slices; ++i)
1852 {
1853 out_mem[i] /= in.at(0, 0, i);
1854 }
1855 }
1856 }
1857
1858 return *this;
1859 }
1860
1861
1862
1864template<typename eT>
1865template<typename T1, typename T2>
1866inline
1867Mat<eT>::Mat
1868 (
1869 const Base<typename Mat<eT>::pod_type,T1>& A,
1870 const Base<typename Mat<eT>::pod_type,T2>& B
1871 )
1872 : n_rows(0)
1873 , n_cols(0)
1874 , n_elem(0)
1875 , n_alloc(0)
1876 , vec_state(0)
1877 , mem_state(0)
1878 , mem()
1879 {
1880 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
1881
1882 init(A,B);
1883 }
1884
1885
1886
1887template<typename eT>
1888inline
1889Mat<eT>::Mat(const subview<eT>& X, const bool use_colmem)
1890 : n_rows(X.n_rows)
1891 , n_cols(X.n_cols)
1892 , n_elem(X.n_elem)
1893 , n_alloc(0)
1894 , vec_state(0)
1895 , mem_state(use_colmem ? 3 : 0)
1896 , mem (use_colmem ? X.colptr(0) : nullptr)
1897 {
1898 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
1899
1900 if(use_colmem)
1901 {
1902 arma_extra_debug_print("Mat::Mat(): using existing memory in a submatrix");
1903 }
1904 else
1905 {
1906 init_cold();
1907
1908 subview<eT>::extract(*this, X);
1909 }
1910 }
1911
1912
1913
1915template<typename eT>
1916inline
1917Mat<eT>::Mat(const subview<eT>& X)
1918 : n_rows(X.n_rows)
1919 , n_cols(X.n_cols)
1920 , n_elem(X.n_elem)
1921 , n_alloc()
1922 , vec_state(0)
1923 , mem_state(0)
1924 , mem()
1925 {
1926 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
1927
1928 init_cold();
1929
1930 subview<eT>::extract(*this, X);
1931 }
1932
1933
1934
1936template<typename eT>
1937inline
1938Mat<eT>&
1939Mat<eT>::operator=(const subview<eT>& X)
1940 {
1941 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
1942
1943 const bool alias = (this == &(X.m));
1944
1945 if(alias == false)
1946 {
1947 init_warm(X.n_rows, X.n_cols);
1948
1949 subview<eT>::extract(*this, X);
1950 }
1951 else
1952 {
1953 Mat<eT> tmp(X);
1954
1955 steal_mem(tmp);
1956 }
1957
1958 return *this;
1959 }
1960
1961
1963template<typename eT>
1964inline
1965Mat<eT>&
1966Mat<eT>::operator+=(const subview<eT>& X)
1967 {
1968 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
1969
1970 subview<eT>::plus_inplace(*this, X);
1971
1972 return *this;
1973 }
1974
1975
1977template<typename eT>
1978inline
1979Mat<eT>&
1980Mat<eT>::operator-=(const subview<eT>& X)
1981 {
1982 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
1983
1984 subview<eT>::minus_inplace(*this, X);
1985
1986 return *this;
1987 }
1988
1989
1990

1994Mat<eT>&
1995Mat<eT>::operator*=(const subview<eT>& X)
1996 {
1997 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
1998
1999 glue_times::apply_inplace(*this, X);
2000
2001 return *this;
2002 }

2254 {
2255 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
2256
2257 const bool alias = (this == &(X.m));
2258
2259 if(alias == false)
2260 {

2262
2263 diagview<eT>::extract(*this, X);
2264 }
2265 else
2266 {
2267 Mat<eT> tmp(X);
2268
2269 steal_mem(tmp);
2270 }
2271
2272 return *this;
2273 }

2415
2416template<typename eT>
2417template<typename T1>
2418inline
2419Mat<eT>&
2420Mat<eT>::operator*=(const subview_elem1<eT,T1>& X)
2421 {
2422 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
2423
2424 glue_times::apply_inplace(*this, X);
2425
2426 return *this;
2427 }
2428
2429
2430
2431template<typename eT>
2432template<typename T1>
2433inline
2434Mat<eT>&
2435Mat<eT>::operator%=(const subview_elem1<eT,T1>& X)
2436 {
2437 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
2438
2439 subview_elem1<eT,T1>::schur_inplace(*this, X);
2440
2441 return *this;
2442 }
2443
2444
2445
2446template<typename eT>
2447template<typename T1>
2448inline
2449Mat<eT>&
2450Mat<eT>::operator/=(const subview_elem1<eT,T1>& X)
2451 {
2452 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
2453
2454 subview_elem1<eT,T1>::div_inplace(*this, X);
2455
2456 return *this;
2457 }
2458
2459
2460
2461template<typename eT>
2462template<typename T1, typename T2>
2463inline
2464Mat<eT>::Mat(const subview_elem2<eT,T1,T2>& X)
2465 : n_rows(0)
2466 , n_cols(0)
2467 , n_elem(0)
2468 , n_alloc(0)
2469 , vec_state(0)
2470 , mem_state(0)
2471 , mem()
2472 {
2473 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
2474
2475 this->operator=(X);
2476 }
2477
2478
2479
2480template<typename eT>
2481template<typename T1, typename T2>
2482inline
2483Mat<eT>&
2484Mat<eT>::operator=(const subview_elem2<eT,T1,T2>& X)
2485 {
2486 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
2487
2488 subview_elem2<eT,T1,T2>::extract(*this, X);
2489
2490 return *this;
2491 }

2498Mat<eT>&
2499Mat<eT>::operator+=(const subview_elem2<eT,T1,T2>& X)
2500 {
2501 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
2502

2504
2505 return *this;
2506 }

2515 {

2517

2560 {

2568
2569
2570template<typename eT>
2571template<typename T1>
2572inline
2573Mat<eT>::Mat(const SpBase<eT, T1>& m)
2574 : n_rows(0)
2575 , n_cols(0)
2576 , n_elem(0)
2577 , n_alloc(0)
2578 , vec_state(0)
2579 , mem_state(0)
2580 , mem()
2581 {
2582 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
2583
2584 (*this).operator=(m);
2585 }
2586
2587
2588
2589template<typename eT>
2590template<typename T1>
2591inline
2592Mat<eT>&
2593Mat<eT>::operator=(const SpBase<eT, T1>& m)
2594 {
2595 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
2596
2597 const unwrap_spmat<T1> U(m.get_ref());
2598 const SpMat<eT>& x = U.M;
2599
2600 const uword x_n_cols = x.n_cols;
2601
2602 (*this).zeros(x.n_rows, x_n_cols);
2603
2604 const eT* x_values = x.values;
2605 const uword* x_row_indices = x.row_indices;
2606 const uword* x_col_ptrs = x.col_ptrs;
2607
2608 for(uword x_col = 0; x_col < x_n_cols; ++x_col)
2609 {
2610 const uword start = x_col_ptrs[x_col ];
2611 const uword end = x_col_ptrs[x_col + 1];
2612
2613 for(uword i = start; i < end; ++i)
2614 {
2615 const uword x_row = x_row_indices[i];
2616 const eT x_val = x_values[i];
2617
2618 at(x_row, x_col) = x_val;
2619 }
2620 }
2621
2622 return *this;
2623 }
2624
2625
2626
2627template<typename eT>
2628template<typename T1>
2629inline
2630Mat<eT>&
2631Mat<eT>::operator+=(const SpBase<eT, T1>& m)
2632 {
2633 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
2634
2635 const SpProxy<T1> p(m.get_ref());
2636
2637 arma_debug_assert_same_size(n_rows, n_cols, p.get_n_rows(), p.get_n_cols(), "addition");
2638
2639 typename SpProxy<T1>::const_iterator_type it = p.begin();
2640 typename SpProxy<T1>::const_iterator_type it_end = p.end();
2641
2642 for(; it != it_end; ++it) { at(it.row(), it.col()) += (*it); }
2643
2644 return *this;
2645 }
2646
2647
2648
2649template<typename eT>
2650template<typename T1>
2651inline
2652Mat<eT>&
2653Mat<eT>::operator-=(const SpBase<eT, T1>& m)
2654 {
2655 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
2656
2657 const SpProxy<T1> p(m.get_ref());
2658
2659 arma_debug_assert_same_size(n_rows, n_cols, p.get_n_rows(), p.get_n_cols(), "subtraction");
2660
2661 typename SpProxy<T1>::const_iterator_type it = p.begin();
2662 typename SpProxy<T1>::const_iterator_type it_end = p.end();
2663
2664 for(; it != it_end; ++it) { at(it.row(), it.col()) -= (*it); }
2665
2666 return *this;
2667 }
2668
2669
2670
2671template<typename eT>
2672template<typename T1>
2673inline
2674Mat<eT>&
2675Mat<eT>::operator*=(const SpBase<eT, T1>& m)
2676 {
2677 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
2678
2679 Mat<eT> z = (*this) * m.get_ref();
2680
2681 steal_mem(z);
2682
2683 return *this;
2684 }
2685
2686
2687
2688template<typename eT>
2689template<typename T1>
2690inline
2691Mat<eT>&
2692Mat<eT>::operator%=(const SpBase<eT, T1>& m)
2693 {
2694 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
2695
2696 const SpProxy<T1> p(m.get_ref());
2697
2698 arma_debug_assert_same_size(n_rows, n_cols, p.get_n_rows(), p.get_n_cols(), "element-wise multiplication");
2699
2700 typename SpProxy<T1>::const_iterator_type it = p.begin();
2701 typename SpProxy<T1>::const_iterator_type it_end = p.end();
2702
2703 // We have to zero everything that isn't being used.
2704 arrayops::inplace_set(memptr(), eT(0), (it.col() * n_rows) + it.row());
2705
2706 while(it != it_end)
2707 {
2708 const uword cur_loc = (it.col() * n_rows) + it.row();
2709
2710 access::rw(mem[cur_loc]) *= (*it);
2711
2712 ++it;
2713
2714 const uword next_loc = (it == it_end)
2715 ? (p.get_n_cols() * n_rows)
2716 : (it.col() * n_rows) + it.row();
2717
2718 arrayops::inplace_set(memptr() + cur_loc + 1, eT(0), (next_loc - cur_loc - 1));
2719 }
2720
2721 return *this;
2722 }
2723
2724
2725
2726template<typename eT>
2727template<typename T1>
2728inline
2729Mat<eT>&
2730Mat<eT>::operator/=(const SpBase<eT, T1>& m)
2731 {
2732 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
2733
2734 // NOTE: use of this function is not advised; it is implemented only for completeness
2735
2736 const SpProxy<T1> p(m.get_ref());
2737
2738 arma_debug_assert_same_size(n_rows, n_cols, p.get_n_rows(), p.get_n_cols(), "element-wise division");
2739
2740 for(uword c = 0; c < n_cols; ++c)
2741 for(uword r = 0; r < n_rows; ++r)
2742 {
2743 at(r, c) /= p.at(r, c);
2744 }
2745
2746 return *this;
2747 }
2748
2749
2750
2751template<typename eT>
2752inline
2753Mat<eT>::Mat(const SpSubview<eT>& X)
2754 : n_rows(0)
2755 , n_cols(0)
2756 , n_elem(0)
2757 , n_alloc(0)
2758 , vec_state(0)
2759 , mem_state(0)
2760 , mem()
2761 {
2762 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
2763
2764 (*this).operator=(X);
2765 }
2766
2767
2768
2769template<typename eT>
2770inline
2771Mat<eT>&
2772Mat<eT>::operator=(const SpSubview<eT>& X)
2773 {
2774 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
2775
2776 (*this).zeros(X.n_rows, X.n_cols);
2777
2778 if(X.n_rows == X.m.n_rows)
2779 {
2780 const uword sv_col_start = X.aux_col1;
2781 const uword sv_col_end = X.aux_col1 + X.n_cols - 1;
2782
2783 const eT* m_values = X.m.values;
2784 const uword* m_row_indices = X.m.row_indices;
2785 const uword* m_col_ptrs = X.m.col_ptrs;
2786
2787 for(uword m_col = sv_col_start; m_col <= sv_col_end; ++m_col)
2788 {
2789 const uword m_col_adjusted = m_col - sv_col_start;
2790
2791 const uword start = m_col_ptrs[m_col ];
2792 const uword end = m_col_ptrs[m_col + 1];
2793
2794 for(uword ii = start; ii < end; ++ii)
2795 {
2796 const uword m_row = m_row_indices[ii];
2797 const eT m_val = m_values[ii];
2798
2799 at(m_row, m_col_adjusted) = m_val;
2800 }
2801 }
2802 }
2803 else
2804 {
2805 typename SpSubview<eT>::const_iterator it = X.begin();
2806 typename SpSubview<eT>::const_iterator it_end = X.end();
2807
2808 for(; it != it_end; ++it) { at(it.row(), it.col()) = (*it); }
2809 }
2810
2811 return *this;
2812 }
2813
2814
2815
2816template<typename eT>
2817inline
2818Mat<eT>::Mat(const spdiagview<eT>& X)
2819 : n_rows(X.n_rows)
2820 , n_cols(X.n_cols)
2821 , n_elem(X.n_elem)
2822 , n_alloc(0)
2823 , vec_state(0)
2824 , mem_state(0)
2825 , mem()
2826 {
2827 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
2828
2829 init_cold();
2830
2831 spdiagview<eT>::extract(*this, X);
2832 }
2833
2834
2835
2836template<typename eT>
2837inline
2838Mat<eT>&
2839Mat<eT>::operator=(const spdiagview<eT>& X)
2840 {
2841 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
2842
2843 init_warm(X.n_rows, X.n_cols);
2844
2845 spdiagview<eT>::extract(*this, X);
2846
2847 return *this;
2848 }

2953
2955template<typename eT>
2956arma_inline
2957subview_row<eT>
2958Mat<eT>::row(const uword row_num)
2959 {
2960 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
2961
2962 arma_debug_check_bounds( row_num >= n_rows, "Mat::row(): index out of bounds" );
2963
2964 return subview_row<eT>(*this, row_num);
2965 }
2966
2967
2968
2970template<typename eT>
2971arma_inline
2972const subview_row<eT>
2973Mat<eT>::row(const uword row_num) const
2974 {
2975 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
2976
2977 arma_debug_check_bounds( row_num >= n_rows, "Mat::row(): index out of bounds" );
2978
2979 return subview_row<eT>(*this, row_num);
2980 }
2981
2982
2983
2984template<typename eT>
2985inline
2986subview_row<eT>
2987Mat<eT>::operator()(const uword row_num, const span& col_span)
2988 {
2989 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
2990
2991 const bool col_all = col_span.whole;
2992
2993 const uword local_n_cols = n_cols;
2994
2995 const uword in_col1 = col_all ? 0 : col_span.a;
2996 const uword in_col2 = col_span.b;
2997 const uword submat_n_cols = col_all ? local_n_cols : in_col2 - in_col1 + 1;
2998
2999 arma_debug_check_bounds
3000 (
3001 (row_num >= n_rows)
3002 ||
3003 ( col_all ? false : ((in_col1 > in_col2) || (in_col2 >= local_n_cols)) )
3004 ,
3005 "Mat::operator(): indices out of bounds or incorrectly used"
3006 );
3007
3008 return subview_row<eT>(*this, row_num, in_col1, submat_n_cols);
3009 }
3010
3011
3012
3013template<typename eT>
3014inline
3015const subview_row<eT>
3016Mat<eT>::operator()(const uword row_num, const span& col_span) const
3017 {
3018 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
3019
3020 const bool col_all = col_span.whole;
3021
3022 const uword local_n_cols = n_cols;
3023
3024 const uword in_col1 = col_all ? 0 : col_span.a;
3025 const uword in_col2 = col_span.b;
3026 const uword submat_n_cols = col_all ? local_n_cols : in_col2 - in_col1 + 1;
3027
3028 arma_debug_check_bounds
3029 (
3030 (row_num >= n_rows)
3031 ||
3032 ( col_all ? false : ((in_col1 > in_col2) || (in_col2 >= local_n_cols)) )
3033 ,
3034 "Mat::operator(): indices out of bounds or incorrectly used"
3035 );
3036
3037 return subview_row<eT>(*this, row_num, in_col1, submat_n_cols);
3038 }
3039

3071
3072template<typename eT>
3073inline
3074subview_col<eT>
3075Mat<eT>::operator()(const span& row_span, const uword col_num)
3076 {
3077 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
3078
3079 const bool row_all = row_span.whole;
3080
3081 const uword local_n_rows = n_rows;
3082
3083 const uword in_row1 = row_all ? 0 : row_span.a;
3084 const uword in_row2 = row_span.b;
3085 const uword submat_n_rows = row_all ? local_n_rows : in_row2 - in_row1 + 1;
3086
3087 arma_debug_check_bounds
3088 (
3089 (col_num >= n_cols)
3090 ||
3091 ( row_all ? false : ((in_row1 > in_row2) || (in_row2 >= local_n_rows)) )
3092 ,
3093 "Mat::operator(): indices out of bounds or incorrectly used"
3094 );
3095
3096 return subview_col<eT>(*this, col_num, in_row1, submat_n_rows);
3097 }
3098
3099
3100
3101template<typename eT>
3102inline
3103const subview_col<eT>
3104Mat<eT>::operator()(const span& row_span, const uword col_num) const
3105 {
3106 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
3107
3108 const bool row_all = row_span.whole;
3109
3110 const uword local_n_rows = n_rows;
3111
3112 const uword in_row1 = row_all ? 0 : row_span.a;
3113 const uword in_row2 = row_span.b;
3114 const uword submat_n_rows = row_all ? local_n_rows : in_row2 - in_row1 + 1;
3115
3116 arma_debug_check_bounds
3117 (
3118 (col_num >= n_cols)
3119 ||
3120 ( row_all ? false : ((in_row1 > in_row2) || (in_row2 >= local_n_rows)) )
3121 ,
3122 "Mat::operator(): indices out of bounds or incorrectly used"
3123 );
3124
3125 return subview_col<eT>(*this, col_num, in_row1, submat_n_rows);
3126 }

3128
3129
3135template<typename eT>
3136inline
3137Col<eT>
3138Mat<eT>::unsafe_col(const uword col_num)
3139 {
3140 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
3141
3142 arma_debug_check_bounds( col_num >= n_cols, "Mat::unsafe_col(): index out of bounds" );
3143
3144 return Col<eT>(colptr(col_num), n_rows, false, true);
3145 }
3146
3147
3148
3154template<typename eT>
3155inline
3156const Col<eT>
3157Mat<eT>::unsafe_col(const uword col_num) const
3158 {
3159 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
3160
3161 arma_debug_check_bounds( col_num >= n_cols, "Mat::unsafe_col(): index out of bounds" );
3162
3163 typedef const Col<eT> out_type;
3164
3165 return out_type(const_cast<eT*>(colptr(col_num)), n_rows, false, true);
3166 }
3167
3168
3169
3171template<typename eT>
3172arma_inline
3173subview<eT>
3174Mat<eT>::rows(const uword in_row1, const uword in_row2)
3175 {
3176 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
3177
3178 arma_debug_check_bounds
3179 (
3180 (in_row1 > in_row2) || (in_row2 >= n_rows),
3181 "Mat::rows(): indices out of bounds or incorrectly used"
3182 );
3183
3184 const uword subview_n_rows = in_row2 - in_row1 + 1;
3185
3186 return subview<eT>(*this, in_row1, 0, subview_n_rows, n_cols );
3187 }
3188
3189
3190
3192template<typename eT>
3193arma_inline
3194const subview<eT>
3195Mat<eT>::rows(const uword in_row1, const uword in_row2) const
3196 {
3197 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
3198
3199 arma_debug_check_bounds
3200 (
3201 (in_row1 > in_row2) || (in_row2 >= n_rows),
3202 "Mat::rows(): indices out of bounds or incorrectly used"
3203 );
3204
3205 const uword subview_n_rows = in_row2 - in_row1 + 1;
3206
3207 return subview<eT>(*this, in_row1, 0, subview_n_rows, n_cols );
3208 }
3209
3210
3211
3213template<typename eT>
3214arma_inline
3215subview<eT>
3216Mat<eT>::cols(const uword in_col1, const uword in_col2)
3217 {
3218 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
3219
3220 arma_debug_check_bounds
3221 (
3222 (in_col1 > in_col2) || (in_col2 >= n_cols),
3223 "Mat::cols(): indices out of bounds or incorrectly used"
3224 );
3225
3226 const uword subview_n_cols = in_col2 - in_col1 + 1;
3227
3228 return subview<eT>(*this, 0, in_col1, n_rows, subview_n_cols);
3229 }
3230
3231
3232
3234template<typename eT>
3235arma_inline
3236const subview<eT>
3237Mat<eT>::cols(const uword in_col1, const uword in_col2) const
3238 {
3239 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
3240
3241 arma_debug_check_bounds
3242 (
3243 (in_col1 > in_col2) || (in_col2 >= n_cols),
3244 "Mat::cols(): indices out of bounds or incorrectly used"
3245 );
3246
3247 const uword subview_n_cols = in_col2 - in_col1 + 1;
3248
3249 return subview<eT>(*this, 0, in_col1, n_rows, subview_n_cols);
3250 }
3251
3252
3253
3255template<typename eT>
3256inline
3257subview<eT>
3258Mat<eT>::rows(const span& row_span)
3259 {
3260 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
3261
3262 const bool row_all = row_span.whole;
3263
3264 const uword local_n_rows = n_rows;
3265
3266 const uword in_row1 = row_all ? 0 : row_span.a;
3267 const uword in_row2 = row_span.b;
3268 const uword submat_n_rows = row_all ? local_n_rows : in_row2 - in_row1 + 1;
3269
3270 arma_debug_check_bounds
3271 (
3272 ( row_all ? false : ((in_row1 > in_row2) || (in_row2 >= local_n_rows)) )
3273 ,
3274 "Mat::rows(): indices out of bounds or incorrectly used"
3275 );
3276
3277 return subview<eT>(*this, in_row1, 0, submat_n_rows, n_cols);
3278 }
3279
3280
3281
3283template<typename eT>
3284inline
3285const subview<eT>
3286Mat<eT>::rows(const span& row_span) const
3287 {
3288 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
3289
3290 const bool row_all = row_span.whole;
3291
3292 const uword local_n_rows = n_rows;
3293
3294 const uword in_row1 = row_all ? 0 : row_span.a;
3295 const uword in_row2 = row_span.b;
3296 const uword submat_n_rows = row_all ? local_n_rows : in_row2 - in_row1 + 1;
3297
3298 arma_debug_check_bounds
3299 (
3300 ( row_all ? false : ((in_row1 > in_row2) || (in_row2 >= local_n_rows)) )
3301 ,
3302 "Mat::rows(): indices out of bounds or incorrectly used"
3303 );
3304
3305 return subview<eT>(*this, in_row1, 0, submat_n_rows, n_cols);
3306 }
3307
3308
3309
3311template<typename eT>
3312arma_inline
3313subview<eT>
3314Mat<eT>::cols(const span& col_span)
3315 {
3316 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
3317
3318 const bool col_all = col_span.whole;
3319
3320 const uword local_n_cols = n_cols;
3321
3322 const uword in_col1 = col_all ? 0 : col_span.a;
3323 const uword in_col2 = col_span.b;
3324 const uword submat_n_cols = col_all ? local_n_cols : in_col2 - in_col1 + 1;
3325
3326 arma_debug_check_bounds
3327 (
3328 ( col_all ? false : ((in_col1 > in_col2) || (in_col2 >= local_n_cols)) )
3329 ,
3330 "Mat::cols(): indices out of bounds or incorrectly used"
3331 );
3332
3333 return subview<eT>(*this, 0, in_col1, n_rows, submat_n_cols);
3334 }
3335

3340arma_inline
3341const subview<eT>
3342Mat<eT>::cols(const span& col_span) const
3343 {
3344 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
3345
3346 const bool col_all = col_span.whole;
3347
3348 const uword local_n_cols = n_cols;
3349
3350 const uword in_col1 = col_all ? 0 : col_span.a;
3351 const uword in_col2 = col_span.b;
3352 const uword submat_n_cols = col_all ? local_n_cols : in_col2 - in_col1 + 1;
3353
3354 arma_debug_check_bounds
3355 (
3356 ( col_all ? false : ((in_col1 > in_col2) || (in_col2 >= local_n_cols)) )
3357 ,
3358 "Mat::cols(): indices out of bounds or incorrectly used"
3359 );
3360
3361 return subview<eT>(*this, 0, in_col1, n_rows, submat_n_cols);
3362 }

3365
3367template<typename eT>
3368arma_inline
3369subview<eT>
3370Mat<eT>::submat(const uword in_row1, const uword in_col1, const uword in_row2, const uword in_col2)
3371 {
3372 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
3373
3374 arma_debug_check_bounds
3375 (
3376 (in_row1 > in_row2) || (in_col1 > in_col2) || (in_row2 >= n_rows) || (in_col2 >= n_cols),
3377 "Mat::submat(): indices out of bounds or incorrectly used"
3378 );
3379
3380 const uword subview_n_rows = in_row2 - in_row1 + 1;
3381 const uword subview_n_cols = in_col2 - in_col1 + 1;
3382
3383 return subview<eT>(*this, in_row1, in_col1, subview_n_rows, subview_n_cols);
3384 }
3385
3386
3387
3389template<typename eT>
3390arma_inline
3391const subview<eT>
3392Mat<eT>::submat(const uword in_row1, const uword in_col1, const uword in_row2, const uword in_col2) const
3393 {
3394 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
3395
3396 arma_debug_check_bounds
3397 (
3398 (in_row1 > in_row2) || (in_col1 > in_col2) || (in_row2 >= n_rows) || (in_col2 >= n_cols),
3399 "Mat::submat(): indices out of bounds or incorrectly used"
3400 );
3401
3402 const uword subview_n_rows = in_row2 - in_row1 + 1;
3403 const uword subview_n_cols = in_col2 - in_col1 + 1;
3404
3405 return subview<eT>(*this, in_row1, in_col1, subview_n_rows, subview_n_cols);
3406 }
3407
3408
3409
3411template<typename eT>
3412arma_inline
3413subview<eT>
3414Mat<eT>::submat(const uword in_row1, const uword in_col1, const SizeMat& s)
3415 {
3416 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
3417
3418 const uword l_n_rows = n_rows;
3419 const uword l_n_cols = n_cols;
3420
3421 const uword s_n_rows = s.n_rows;
3422 const uword s_n_cols = s.n_cols;
3423
3424 arma_debug_check_bounds
3425 (
3426 ((in_row1 >= l_n_rows) || (in_col1 >= l_n_cols) || ((in_row1 + s_n_rows) > l_n_rows) || ((in_col1 + s_n_cols) > l_n_cols)),
3427 "Mat::submat(): indices or size out of bounds"
3428 );
3429
3430 return subview<eT>(*this, in_row1, in_col1, s_n_rows, s_n_cols);
3431 }
3432
3433
3434
3436template<typename eT>
3437arma_inline
3438const subview<eT>
3439Mat<eT>::submat(const uword in_row1, const uword in_col1, const SizeMat& s) const
3440 {
3441 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
3442
3443 const uword l_n_rows = n_rows;
3444 const uword l_n_cols = n_cols;
3445
3446 const uword s_n_rows = s.n_rows;
3447 const uword s_n_cols = s.n_cols;
3448
3449 arma_debug_check_bounds
3450 (
3451 ((in_row1 >= l_n_rows) || (in_col1 >= l_n_cols) || ((in_row1 + s_n_rows) > l_n_rows) || ((in_col1 + s_n_cols) > l_n_cols)),
3452 "Mat::submat(): indices or size out of bounds"
3453 );
3454
3455 return subview<eT>(*this, in_row1, in_col1, s_n_rows, s_n_cols);
3456 }
3457
3458
3459
3461template<typename eT>
3462inline
3463subview<eT>
3464Mat<eT>::submat(const span& row_span, const span& col_span)
3465 {
3466 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
3467
3468 const bool row_all = row_span.whole;
3469 const bool col_all = col_span.whole;
3470
3471 const uword local_n_rows = n_rows;
3472 const uword local_n_cols = n_cols;
3473
3474 const uword in_row1 = row_all ? 0 : row_span.a;
3475 const uword in_row2 = row_span.b;
3476 const uword submat_n_rows = row_all ? local_n_rows : in_row2 - in_row1 + 1;
3477
3478 const uword in_col1 = col_all ? 0 : col_span.a;
3479 const uword in_col2 = col_span.b;
3480 const uword submat_n_cols = col_all ? local_n_cols : in_col2 - in_col1 + 1;
3481
3482 arma_debug_check_bounds
3483 (
3484 ( row_all ? false : ((in_row1 > in_row2) || (in_row2 >= local_n_rows)) )
3485 ||
3486 ( col_all ? false : ((in_col1 > in_col2) || (in_col2 >= local_n_cols)) )
3487 ,
3488 "Mat::submat(): indices out of bounds or incorrectly used"
3489 );
3490
3491 return subview<eT>(*this, in_row1, in_col1, submat_n_rows, submat_n_cols);
3492 }
3493
3494
3495
3497template<typename eT>
3498inline
3499const subview<eT>
3500Mat<eT>::submat(const span& row_span, const span& col_span) const
3501 {
3502 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
3503
3504 const bool row_all = row_span.whole;
3505 const bool col_all = col_span.whole;
3506
3507 const uword local_n_rows = n_rows;
3508 const uword local_n_cols = n_cols;
3509
3510 const uword in_row1 = row_all ? 0 : row_span.a;
3511 const uword in_row2 = row_span.b;
3512 const uword submat_n_rows = row_all ? local_n_rows : in_row2 - in_row1 + 1;
3513
3514 const uword in_col1 = col_all ? 0 : col_span.a;
3515 const uword in_col2 = col_span.b;
3516 const uword submat_n_cols = col_all ? local_n_cols : in_col2 - in_col1 + 1;
3517
3518 arma_debug_check_bounds
3519 (
3520 ( row_all ? false : ((in_row1 > in_row2) || (in_row2 >= local_n_rows)) )
3521 ||
3522 ( col_all ? false : ((in_col1 > in_col2) || (in_col2 >= local_n_cols)) )
3523 ,
3524 "Mat::submat(): indices out of bounds or incorrectly used"
3525 );
3526
3527 return subview<eT>(*this, in_row1, in_col1, submat_n_rows, submat_n_cols);
3528 }
3529
3530

3584 {

3586
3587 arma_debug_check_bounds( (N > n_rows), "Mat::head_rows(): size out of bounds" );
3588
3589 return subview<eT>(*this, 0, 0, N, n_cols);
3590 }

3602
3603 return subview<eT>(*this, 0, 0, N, n_cols);

3614
3615 arma_debug_check_bounds( (N > n_rows), "Mat::tail_rows(): size out of bounds" );
3616
3617 const uword start_row = n_rows - N;
3618
3619 return subview<eT>(*this, start_row, 0, N, n_cols);
3620 }
