3931template<typename T1>
3932inline
3933subview_each2< Mat<eT>, 0, T1 >
3934Mat<eT>::each_col(const Base<uword, T1>& indices)
3935 {
3936 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
3937
3938 return subview_each2< Mat<eT>, 0, T1 >(*this, indices);
3939 }
3940
3941
3942
3943template<typename eT>
3944template<typename T1>
3945inline
3946subview_each2< Mat<eT>, 1, T1 >
3947Mat<eT>::each_row(const Base<uword, T1>& indices)
3948 {
3949 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
3950
3951 return subview_each2< Mat<eT>, 1, T1 >(*this, indices);
3952 }
3953
3954
3955
3956template<typename eT>
3957template<typename T1>
3958inline
3959const subview_each2< Mat<eT>, 0, T1 >
3960Mat<eT>::each_col(const Base<uword, T1>& indices) const
3961 {
3962 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
3963
3964 return subview_each2< Mat<eT>, 0, T1 >(*this, indices);
3965 }
3966
3967
3968
3969template<typename eT>
3970template<typename T1>
3971inline
3972const subview_each2< Mat<eT>, 1, T1 >
3973Mat<eT>::each_row(const Base<uword, T1>& indices) const
3974 {
3975 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
3976
3977 return subview_each2< Mat<eT>, 1, T1 >(*this, indices);
3978 }
3979
3980
3981
3983template<typename eT>
3984inline
3985const Mat<eT>&
3986Mat<eT>::each_col(const std::function< void(Col<eT>&) >& F)
3987 {
3988 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
3989
3990 for(uword ii=0; ii < n_cols; ++ii)
3991 {
3992 Col<eT> tmp(colptr(ii), n_rows, false, true);
3993 F(tmp);
3994 }
3995
3996 return *this;
3997 }
3998
3999
4000
4001template<typename eT>
4002inline
4003const Mat<eT>&
4004Mat<eT>::each_col(const std::function< void(const Col<eT>&) >& F) const
4005 {
4006 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
4007
4008 for(uword ii=0; ii < n_cols; ++ii)
4009 {
4010 const Col<eT> tmp(const_cast<eT*>(colptr(ii)), n_rows, false, true);
4011 F(tmp);
4012 }
4013
4014 return *this;
4015 }
4016
4017
4018
4020template<typename eT>
4021inline
4022const Mat<eT>&
4023Mat<eT>::each_row(const std::function< void(Row<eT>&) >& F)
4024 {
4025 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
4026
4027 podarray<eT> array1(n_cols);
4028 podarray<eT> array2(n_cols);
4029
4030 Row<eT> tmp1( array1.memptr(), n_cols, false, true );
4031 Row<eT> tmp2( array2.memptr(), n_cols, false, true );
4032
4033 eT* tmp1_mem = tmp1.memptr();
4034 eT* tmp2_mem = tmp2.memptr();
4035
4036 uword ii, jj;
4037
4038 for(ii=0, jj=1; jj < n_rows; ii+=2, jj+=2)
4039 {
4040 for(uword col_id = 0; col_id < n_cols; ++col_id)
4041 {
4042 const eT* col_mem = colptr(col_id);
4043
4044 tmp1_mem[col_id] = col_mem[ii];
4045 tmp2_mem[col_id] = col_mem[jj];
4046 }
4047
4048 F(tmp1);
4049 F(tmp2);
4050
4051 for(uword col_id = 0; col_id < n_cols; ++col_id)
4052 {
4053 eT* col_mem = colptr(col_id);
4054
4055 col_mem[ii] = tmp1_mem[col_id];
4056 col_mem[jj] = tmp2_mem[col_id];
4057 }
4058 }
4059
4060 if(ii < n_rows)
4061 {
4062 tmp1 = (*this).row(ii);
4063
4064 F(tmp1);
4065
4066 (*this).row(ii) = tmp1;
4067 }
4068
4069 return *this;
4070 }
4071
4072
4073
4074template<typename eT>
4075inline
4076const Mat<eT>&
4077Mat<eT>::each_row(const std::function< void(const Row<eT>&) >& F) const
4078 {
4079 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
4080
4081 podarray<eT> array1(n_cols);
4082 podarray<eT> array2(n_cols);
4083
4084 Row<eT> tmp1( array1.memptr(), n_cols, false, true );
4085 Row<eT> tmp2( array2.memptr(), n_cols, false, true );
4086
4087 eT* tmp1_mem = tmp1.memptr();
4088 eT* tmp2_mem = tmp2.memptr();
4089
4090 uword ii, jj;
4091
4092 for(ii=0, jj=1; jj < n_rows; ii+=2, jj+=2)
4093 {
4094 for(uword col_id = 0; col_id < n_cols; ++col_id)
4095 {
4096 const eT* col_mem = colptr(col_id);
4097
4098 tmp1_mem[col_id] = col_mem[ii];
4099 tmp2_mem[col_id] = col_mem[jj];
4100 }
4101
4102 F(tmp1);
4103 F(tmp2);
4104 }
4105
4106 if(ii < n_rows)
4107 {
4108 tmp1 = (*this).row(ii);
4109
4110 F(tmp1);
4111 }
4112
4113 return *this;
4114 }
4115
4116
4117
4119template<typename eT>
4120arma_inline
4121diagview<eT>
4122Mat<eT>::diag(const sword in_id)
4123 {
4124 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
4125
4126 const uword row_offset = (in_id < 0) ? uword(-in_id) : 0;
4127 const uword col_offset = (in_id > 0) ? uword( in_id) : 0;
4128
4129 arma_debug_check_bounds
4130 (
4131 ((row_offset > 0) && (row_offset >= n_rows)) || ((col_offset > 0) && (col_offset >= n_cols)),
4132 "Mat::diag(): requested diagonal out of bounds"
4133 );
4134
4135 const uword len = (std::min)(n_rows - row_offset, n_cols - col_offset);
4136
4137 return diagview<eT>(*this, row_offset, col_offset, len);
4138 }
4139
4140
4141
4143template<typename eT>
4144arma_inline
4145const diagview<eT>
4146Mat<eT>::diag(const sword in_id) const
4147 {
4148 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
4149
4150 const uword row_offset = uword( (in_id < 0) ? -in_id : 0 );
4151 const uword col_offset = uword( (in_id > 0) ? in_id : 0 );
4152
4153 arma_debug_check_bounds
4154 (
4155 ((row_offset > 0) && (row_offset >= n_rows)) || ((col_offset > 0) && (col_offset >= n_cols)),
4156 "Mat::diag(): requested diagonal out of bounds"
4157 );
4158
4159 const uword len = (std::min)(n_rows - row_offset, n_cols - col_offset);
4160
4161 return diagview<eT>(*this, row_offset, col_offset, len);
4162 }
4163
4164
4165
4166template<typename eT>
4167inline
4168void
4169Mat<eT>::swap_rows(const uword in_row1, const uword in_row2)
4170 {
4171 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
4172
4173 const uword local_n_rows = n_rows;
4174 const uword local_n_cols = n_cols;
4175
4176 arma_debug_check_bounds
4177 (
4178 (in_row1 >= local_n_rows) || (in_row2 >= local_n_rows),
4179 "Mat::swap_rows(): index out of bounds"
4180 );
4181
4182 if(n_elem > 0)
4183 {
4184 for(uword ucol=0; ucol < local_n_cols; ++ucol)
4185 {
4186 const uword offset = ucol * local_n_rows;
4187 const uword pos1 = in_row1 + offset;
4188 const uword pos2 = in_row2 + offset;
4189
4190 std::swap( access::rw(mem[pos1]), access::rw(mem[pos2]) );
4191 }
4192 }
4193 }
4194
4195
4196
4197template<typename eT>
4198inline
4199void
4200Mat<eT>::swap_cols(const uword in_colA, const uword in_colB)
4201 {
4202 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
4203
4204 const uword local_n_rows = n_rows;
4205 const uword local_n_cols = n_cols;
4206
4207 arma_debug_check_bounds
4208 (
4209 (in_colA >= local_n_cols) || (in_colB >= local_n_cols),
4210 "Mat::swap_cols(): index out of bounds"
4211 );
4212
4213 if(n_elem > 0)
4214 {
4215 eT* ptrA = colptr(in_colA);
4216 eT* ptrB = colptr(in_colB);
4217
4218 eT tmp_i;
4219 eT tmp_j;
4220
4221 uword iq,jq;
4222 for(iq=0, jq=1; jq < local_n_rows; iq+=2, jq+=2)
4223 {
4224 tmp_i = ptrA[iq];
4225 tmp_j = ptrA[jq];
4226
4227 ptrA[iq] = ptrB[iq];
4228 ptrA[jq] = ptrB[jq];
4229
4230 ptrB[iq] = tmp_i;
4231 ptrB[jq] = tmp_j;
4232 }
4233
4234 if(iq < local_n_rows)
4235 {
4236 std::swap( ptrA[iq], ptrB[iq] );
4237 }
4238 }
4239 }
4240
4241
4242
4244template<typename eT>
4245inline
4246void
4247Mat<eT>::shed_row(const uword row_num)
4248 {
4249 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
4250
4251 arma_debug_check_bounds( row_num >= n_rows, "Mat::shed_row(): index out of bounds" );
4252
4253 shed_rows(row_num, row_num);
4254 }
4255
4256
4257
4259template<typename eT>
4260inline
4261void
4262Mat<eT>::shed_col(const uword col_num)
4263 {
4264 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
4265
4266 arma_debug_check_bounds( col_num >= n_cols, "Mat::shed_col(): index out of bounds" );
4267
4268 shed_cols(col_num, col_num);
4269 }
4270
4271
4272
4274template<typename eT>
4275inline
4276void
4277Mat<eT>::shed_rows(const uword in_row1, const uword in_row2)
4278 {
4279 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
4280
4281 arma_debug_check_bounds
4282 (
4283 (in_row1 > in_row2) || (in_row2 >= n_rows),
4284 "Mat::shed_rows(): indices out of bounds or incorrectly used"
4285 );
4286
4287 const uword n_keep_front = in_row1;
4288 const uword n_keep_back = n_rows - (in_row2 + 1);
4289
4290 Mat<eT> X(n_keep_front + n_keep_back, n_cols, arma_nozeros_indicator());
4291
4292 if(n_keep_front > 0)
4293 {
4294 X.rows( 0, (n_keep_front-1) ) = rows( 0, (in_row1-1) );
4295 }
4296
4297 if(n_keep_back > 0)
4298 {
4299 X.rows( n_keep_front, (n_keep_front+n_keep_back-1) ) = rows( (in_row2+1), (n_rows-1) );
4300 }
4301
4302 steal_mem(X);
4303 }
4304
4305
4306
4308template<typename eT>
4309inline
4310void
4311Mat<eT>::shed_cols(const uword in_col1, const uword in_col2)
4312 {
4313 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
4314
4315 arma_debug_check_bounds
4316 (
4317 (in_col1 > in_col2) || (in_col2 >= n_cols),
4318 "Mat::shed_cols(): indices out of bounds or incorrectly used"
4319 );
4320
4321 const uword n_keep_front = in_col1;
4322 const uword n_keep_back = n_cols - (in_col2 + 1);
4323
4324 Mat<eT> X(n_rows, n_keep_front + n_keep_back, arma_nozeros_indicator());
4325
4326 if(n_keep_front > 0)
4327 {
4328 X.cols( 0, (n_keep_front-1) ) = cols( 0, (in_col1-1) );
4329 }
4330
4331 if(n_keep_back > 0)
4332 {
4333 X.cols( n_keep_front, (n_keep_front+n_keep_back-1) ) = cols( (in_col2+1), (n_cols-1) );
4334 }
4335
4336 steal_mem(X);
4337 }
4338
4339
4340
4342template<typename eT>
4343template<typename T1>
4344inline
4345void
4346Mat<eT>::shed_rows(const Base<uword, T1>& indices)
4347 {
4348 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
4349
4350 const unwrap_check_mixed<T1> U(indices.get_ref(), *this);
4351 const Mat<uword>& tmp1 = U.M;
4352
4353 arma_debug_check( ((tmp1.is_vec() == false) && (tmp1.is_empty() == false)), "Mat::shed_rows(): list of indices must be a vector" );
4354
4355 if(tmp1.is_empty()) { return; }
4356
4357 const Col<uword> tmp2(const_cast<uword*>(tmp1.memptr()), tmp1.n_elem, false, false);
4358
4359 const Col<uword>& rows_to_shed = (tmp2.is_sorted("strictascend") == false)
4360 ? Col<uword>(unique(tmp2))
4361 : Col<uword>(const_cast<uword*>(tmp2.memptr()), tmp2.n_elem, false, false);
4362
4363 const uword* rows_to_shed_mem = rows_to_shed.memptr();
4364 const uword N = rows_to_shed.n_elem;
4365
4366 if(arma_config::debug)
4367 {
4368 for(uword i=0; i<N; ++i)
4369 {
4370 arma_debug_check_bounds( (rows_to_shed_mem[i] >= n_rows), "Mat::shed_rows(): indices out of bounds" );
4371 }
4372 }
4373
4374 Col<uword> tmp3(n_rows, arma_nozeros_indicator());
4375
4376 uword* tmp3_mem = tmp3.memptr();
4377
4378 uword i = 0;
4379 uword count = 0;
4380
4381 for(uword j=0; j < n_rows; ++j)
4382 {
4383 if(i < N)
4384 {
4385 if( j != rows_to_shed_mem[i] )
4386 {
4387 tmp3_mem[count] = j;
4388 ++count;
4389 }
4390 else
4391 {
4392 ++i;
4393 }
4394 }
4395 else
4396 {
4397 tmp3_mem[count] = j;
4398 ++count;
4399 }
4400 }
4401
4402 const Col<uword> rows_to_keep(tmp3.memptr(), count, false, false);
4403
4404 Mat<eT> X = (*this).rows(rows_to_keep);
4405
4406 steal_mem(X);
4407 }
4408
4409
4410
4412template<typename eT>
4413template<typename T1>
4414inline
4415void
4416Mat<eT>::shed_cols(const Base<uword, T1>& indices)
4417 {
4418 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
4419
4420 const unwrap_check_mixed<T1> U(indices.get_ref(), *this);
4421 const Mat<uword>& tmp1 = U.M;
4422
4423 arma_debug_check( ((tmp1.is_vec() == false) && (tmp1.is_empty() == false)), "Mat::shed_cols(): list of indices must be a vector" );
4424
4425 if(tmp1.is_empty()) { return; }
4426
4427 const Col<uword> tmp2(const_cast<uword*>(tmp1.memptr()), tmp1.n_elem, false, false);
4428
4429 const Col<uword>& cols_to_shed = (tmp2.is_sorted("strictascend") == false)
4430 ? Col<uword>(unique(tmp2))
4431 : Col<uword>(const_cast<uword*>(tmp2.memptr()), tmp2.n_elem, false, false);
4432
4433 const uword* cols_to_shed_mem = cols_to_shed.memptr();
4434 const uword N = cols_to_shed.n_elem;
4435
4436 if(arma_config::debug)
4437 {
4438 for(uword i=0; i<N; ++i)
4439 {
4440 arma_debug_check_bounds( (cols_to_shed_mem[i] >= n_cols), "Mat::shed_cols(): indices out of bounds" );
4441 }
4442 }
4443
4444 Col<uword> tmp3(n_cols, arma_nozeros_indicator());
4445
4446 uword* tmp3_mem = tmp3.memptr();
4447
4448 uword i = 0;
4449 uword count = 0;
4450
4451 for(uword j=0; j < n_cols; ++j)
4452 {
4453 if(i < N)
4454 {
4455 if( j != cols_to_shed_mem[i] )
4456 {
4457 tmp3_mem[count] = j;
4458 ++count;
4459 }
4460 else
4461 {
4462 ++i;
4463 }
4464 }
4465 else
4466 {
4467 tmp3_mem[count] = j;
4468 ++count;
4469 }
4470 }
4471
4472 const Col<uword> cols_to_keep(tmp3.memptr(), count, false, false);
4473
4474 Mat<eT> X = (*this).cols(cols_to_keep);
4475
4476 steal_mem(X);
4477 }
4478
4479
4480
4483template<typename eT>
4484inline
4485void
4486Mat<eT>::insert_rows(const uword row_num, const uword N, const bool set_to_zero)
4487 {
4488 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
4489
4490 const uword t_n_rows = n_rows;
4491 const uword t_n_cols = n_cols;
4492
4493 const uword A_n_rows = row_num;
4494 const uword B_n_rows = t_n_rows - row_num;
4495
4496 // insertion at row_num == n_rows is in effect an append operation
4497 arma_debug_check_bounds( (row_num > t_n_rows), "Mat::insert_rows(): index out of bounds" );
4498
4499 if(N > 0)
4500 {
4501 Mat<eT> out(t_n_rows + N, t_n_cols, arma_nozeros_indicator());
4502
4503 if(A_n_rows > 0)
4504 {
4505 out.rows(0, A_n_rows-1) = rows(0, A_n_rows-1);
4506 }
4507
4508 if(B_n_rows > 0)
4509 {
4510 out.rows(row_num + N, t_n_rows + N - 1) = rows(row_num, t_n_rows-1);
4511 }
4512
4513 if(set_to_zero)
4514 {
4515 out.rows(row_num, row_num + N - 1).zeros();
4516 }
4517
4518 steal_mem(out);
4519 }
4520 }
4521
4522
4523
4526template<typename eT>
4527inline
4528void
4529Mat<eT>::insert_cols(const uword col_num, const uword N, const bool set_to_zero)
4530 {
4531 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
4532
4533 const uword t_n_rows = n_rows;
4534 const uword t_n_cols = n_cols;
4535
4536 const uword A_n_cols = col_num;
4537 const uword B_n_cols = t_n_cols - col_num;
4538
4539 // insertion at col_num == n_cols is in effect an append operation
4540 arma_debug_check_bounds( (col_num > t_n_cols), "Mat::insert_cols(): index out of bounds" );
4541
4542 if(N > 0)
4543 {
4544 Mat<eT> out(t_n_rows, t_n_cols + N, arma_nozeros_indicator());
4545
4546 if(A_n_cols > 0)
4547 {
4548 out.cols(0, A_n_cols-1) = cols(0, A_n_cols-1);
4549 }
4550
4551 if(B_n_cols > 0)
4552 {
4553 out.cols(col_num + N, t_n_cols + N - 1) = cols(col_num, t_n_cols-1);
4554 }
4555
4556 if(set_to_zero)
4557 {
4558 out.cols(col_num, col_num + N - 1).zeros();
4559 }
4560
4561 steal_mem(out);
4562 }
4563 }
4564
4565
4566
4569template<typename eT>
4570template<typename T1>
4571inline
4572void
4573Mat<eT>::insert_rows(const uword row_num, const Base<eT,T1>& X)
4574 {
4575 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
4576
4577 const unwrap<T1> tmp(X.get_ref());
4578 const Mat<eT>& C = tmp.M;
4579
4580 const uword C_n_rows = C.n_rows;
4581 const uword C_n_cols = C.n_cols;
4582
4583 const uword t_n_rows = n_rows;
4584 const uword t_n_cols = n_cols;
4585
4586 const uword A_n_rows = row_num;
4587 const uword B_n_rows = t_n_rows - row_num;
4588
4589 bool err_state = false;
4590 char* err_msg = nullptr;
4591
4592 // insertion at row_num == n_rows is in effect an append operation
4593
4594 arma_debug_set_error
4595 (
4596 err_state,
4597 err_msg,
4598 (row_num > t_n_rows),
4599 "Mat::insert_rows(): index out of bounds"
4600 );
4601
4602 arma_debug_set_error
4603 (
4604 err_state,
4605 err_msg,
4606 ( (C_n_cols != t_n_cols) && ( (t_n_rows > 0) || (t_n_cols > 0) ) && ( (C_n_rows > 0) || (C_n_cols > 0) ) ),
4607 "Mat::insert_rows(): given object has an incompatible number of columns"
4608 );
4609
4610 arma_debug_check_bounds(err_state, err_msg);
4611
4612 if(C_n_rows > 0)
4613 {
4614 Mat<eT> out( t_n_rows + C_n_rows, (std::max)(t_n_cols, C_n_cols), arma_nozeros_indicator() );
4615
4616 if(t_n_cols > 0)
4617 {
4618 if(A_n_rows > 0)
4619 {
4620 out.rows(0, A_n_rows-1) = rows(0, A_n_rows-1);
4621 }
4622
4623 if( (t_n_cols > 0) && (B_n_rows > 0) )
4624 {
4625 out.rows(row_num + C_n_rows, t_n_rows + C_n_rows - 1) = rows(row_num, t_n_rows - 1);
4626 }
4627 }
4628
4629 if(C_n_cols > 0)
4630 {
4631 out.rows(row_num, row_num + C_n_rows - 1) = C;
4632 }
4633
4634 steal_mem(out);
4635 }
4636 }
4637
4638
4639
4642template<typename eT>
4643template<typename T1>
4644inline
4645void
4646Mat<eT>::insert_cols(const uword col_num, const Base<eT,T1>& X)
4647 {
4648 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
4649
4650 const unwrap<T1> tmp(X.get_ref());
4651 const Mat<eT>& C = tmp.M;
4652
4653 const uword C_n_rows = C.n_rows;
4654 const uword C_n_cols = C.n_cols;
4655
4656 const uword t_n_rows = n_rows;
4657 const uword t_n_cols = n_cols;
4658
4659 const uword A_n_cols = col_num;
4660 const uword B_n_cols = t_n_cols - col_num;
4661
4662 bool err_state = false;
4663 char* err_msg = nullptr;
4664
4665 // insertion at col_num == n_cols is in effect an append operation
4666
4667 arma_debug_set_error
4668 (
4669 err_state,
4670 err_msg,
4671 (col_num > t_n_cols),
4672 "Mat::insert_cols(): index out of bounds"
4673 );
4674
4675 arma_debug_set_error
4676 (
4677 err_state,
4678 err_msg,
4679 ( (C_n_rows != t_n_rows) && ( (t_n_rows > 0) || (t_n_cols > 0) ) && ( (C_n_rows > 0) || (C_n_cols > 0) ) ),
4680 "Mat::insert_cols(): given object has an incompatible number of rows"
4681 );
4682
4683 arma_debug_check_bounds(err_state, err_msg);
4684
4685 if(C_n_cols > 0)
4686 {
4687 Mat<eT> out( (std::max)(t_n_rows, C_n_rows), t_n_cols + C_n_cols, arma_nozeros_indicator() );
4688
4689 if(t_n_rows > 0)
4690 {
4691 if(A_n_cols > 0)
4692 {
4693 out.cols(0, A_n_cols-1) = cols(0, A_n_cols-1);
4694 }
4695
4696 if(B_n_cols > 0)
4697 {
4698 out.cols(col_num + C_n_cols, t_n_cols + C_n_cols - 1) = cols(col_num, t_n_cols - 1);
4699 }
4700 }
4701
4702 if(C_n_rows > 0)
4703 {
4704 out.cols(col_num, col_num + C_n_cols - 1) = C;
4705 }
4706
4707 steal_mem(out);
4708 }
4709 }
4710
4711
4712
4713template<typename eT>
4714template<typename T1, typename gen_type>
4715inline
4716Mat<eT>::Mat(const Gen<T1, gen_type>& X)
4717 : n_rows(X.n_rows)
4718 , n_cols(X.n_cols)
4719 , n_elem(n_rows*n_cols)
4720 , n_alloc()
4721 , vec_state(0)
4722 , mem_state(0)
4723 , mem()
4724 {
4725 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
4726
4727 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T1::elem_type >::no ));
4728
4729 init_cold();
4730
4731 X.apply(*this);
4732 }
4733
4734
4735
4736template<typename eT>
4737template<typename T1, typename gen_type>
4738inline
4739Mat<eT>&
4740Mat<eT>::operator=(const Gen<T1, gen_type>& X)
4741 {
4742 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
4743
4744 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T1::elem_type >::no ));
4745
4746 init_warm(X.n_rows, X.n_cols);
4747
4748 X.apply(*this);
4749
4750 return *this;
4751 }
4752

4796
4797 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T1::elem_type >::no ));
4798
4799 const Mat<eT> tmp(X);
4800

4802 }

4971template<typename eT>
4972template<typename T1, typename eop_type>
4973inline
4974Mat<eT>::Mat(const eOp<T1, eop_type>& X)
4975 : n_rows(X.get_n_rows())
4976 , n_cols(X.get_n_cols())
4977 , n_elem(X.get_n_elem())
4978 , n_alloc()
4979 , vec_state(0)
4980 , mem_state(0)
4981 , mem()
4982 {
4983 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
4984
4985 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T1::elem_type >::no ));
4986
4987 init_cold();
4988
4989 eop_type::apply(*this, X);
4990 }
4991
4992
4993
4995template<typename eT>
4996template<typename T1, typename eop_type>
4997inline
4998Mat<eT>&
4999Mat<eT>::operator=(const eOp<T1, eop_type>& X)
5000 {
5001 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
5002
5003 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T1::elem_type >::no ));
5004
5005 const bool bad_alias = (eOp<T1, eop_type>::proxy_type::has_subview && X.P.is_alias(*this));
5006
5007 if(bad_alias == false)
5008 {
5009 init_warm(X.get_n_rows(), X.get_n_cols());
5010
5011 eop_type::apply(*this, X);
5012 }
5013 else
5014 {
5015 arma_extra_debug_print("bad_alias = true");
5016
5017 Mat<eT> tmp(X);
5018
5019 steal_mem(tmp);
5020 }
5021
5022 return *this;
5023 }
5024

5035 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T1::elem_type >::no ));
5036
5037 eop_type::apply_inplace_plus(*this, X);
5038
5039 return *this;
5040 }

5472
5474template<typename eT>
5475template<typename T1, typename T2, typename glue_type>
5476inline
5477Mat<eT>::Mat(const Glue<T1, T2, glue_type>& X)
5478 : n_rows(0)
5479 , n_cols(0)
5480 , n_elem(0)
5481 , n_alloc(0)
5482 , vec_state(0)
5483 , mem_state(0)
5484 , mem()
5485 {
5486 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
5487
5488 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T1::elem_type >::no ));
5489 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T2::elem_type >::no ));
5490
5491 glue_type::apply(*this, X);
5492 }
5493
5494
5495
5497template<typename eT>
5498template<typename T1, typename T2, typename glue_type>
5499inline
5500Mat<eT>&
5501Mat<eT>::operator=(const Glue<T1, T2, glue_type>& X)
5502 {
5503 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
5504
5505 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T1::elem_type >::no ));
5506 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T2::elem_type >::no ));
5507
5508 glue_type::apply(*this, X);
5509
5510 return *this;
5511 }
5512
5513
5514
5516template<typename eT>
5517template<typename T1, typename T2, typename glue_type>
5518inline
5519Mat<eT>&
5520Mat<eT>::operator+=(const Glue<T1, T2, glue_type>& X)
5521 {
5522 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
5523
5524 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T1::elem_type >::no ));
5525 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T2::elem_type >::no ));
5526
5527 const Mat<eT> m(X);
5528
5529 return (*this).operator+=(m);
5530 }
5531
5532
5533
5535template<typename eT>
5536template<typename T1, typename T2, typename glue_type>
5537inline
5538Mat<eT>&
5539Mat<eT>::operator-=(const Glue<T1, T2, glue_type>& X)
5540 {
5541 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
5542
5543 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T1::elem_type >::no ));
5544 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T2::elem_type >::no ));
5545
5546 const Mat<eT> m(X);
5547
5548 return (*this).operator-=(m);
5549 }

5555template<typename T1, typename T2, typename glue_type>
5556inline
5557Mat<eT>&
5558Mat<eT>::operator*=(const Glue<T1, T2, glue_type>& X)
5559 {
5560 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
5561
5562 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T1::elem_type >::no ));
5563 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T2::elem_type >::no ));
5564
5565 glue_times::apply_inplace(*this, X);
5566
5567 return *this;
5568 }

5582 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T2::elem_type >::no ));

5593template<typename T1, typename T2, typename glue_type>
5594inline
5595Mat<eT>&
5596Mat<eT>::operator/=(const Glue<T1, T2, glue_type>& X)
5597 {
5598 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
5599
5600 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T1::elem_type >::no ));
5601 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T2::elem_type >::no ));
5602
5603 const Mat<eT> m(X);
5604
5605 return (*this).operator/=(m);
5606 }

5610template<typename eT>
5611template<typename T1, typename T2>
5612inline
5613Mat<eT>&
5614Mat<eT>::operator+=(const Glue<T1, T2, glue_times>& X)
5615 {
5616 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
5617
5618 glue_times::apply_inplace_plus(*this, X, sword(+1));
5619
5620 return *this;
5621 }
5622

5624
5625template<typename eT>
5626template<typename T1, typename T2>
5627inline
5628Mat<eT>&
5629Mat<eT>::operator-=(const Glue<T1, T2, glue_times>& X)
5630 {
5631 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
5632
5633 glue_times::apply_inplace_plus(*this, X, sword(-1));
5634
5635 return *this;
5636 }

5638
5639
5641template<typename eT>
5642template<typename T1, typename T2, typename eglue_type>
5643inline
5644Mat<eT>::Mat(const eGlue<T1, T2, eglue_type>& X)
5645 : n_rows(X.get_n_rows())
5646 , n_cols(X.get_n_cols())
5647 , n_elem(X.get_n_elem())
5648 , n_alloc()
5649 , vec_state(0)
5650 , mem_state(0)
5651 , mem()
5652 {
5653 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
5654
5655 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T1::elem_type >::no ));
5656 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T2::elem_type >::no ));
5657
5658 init_cold();
5659
5660 eglue_type::apply(*this, X);
5661 }
5662
5663
5664
5666template<typename eT>
5667template<typename T1, typename T2, typename eglue_type>
5668inline
5669Mat<eT>&
5670Mat<eT>::operator=(const eGlue<T1, T2, eglue_type>& X)
5671 {
5672 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
5673
5674 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T1::elem_type >::no ));
5675 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T2::elem_type >::no ));
5676
5677 const bool bad_alias =
5678 (
5679 (eGlue<T1, T2, eglue_type>::proxy1_type::has_subview && X.P1.is_alias(*this))
5680 ||
5681 (eGlue<T1, T2, eglue_type>::proxy2_type::has_subview && X.P2.is_alias(*this))
5682 );
5683
5684 if(bad_alias == false)
5685 {
5686 init_warm(X.get_n_rows(), X.get_n_cols());
5687
5688 eglue_type::apply(*this, X);
5689 }
5690 else
5691 {
5692 arma_extra_debug_print("bad_alias = true");
5693
5694 Mat<eT> tmp(X);
5695
5696 steal_mem(tmp);
5697 }
5698
5699 return *this;
5700 }
5701
5702
5703
5705template<typename eT>
5706template<typename T1, typename T2, typename eglue_type>
5707inline
5708Mat<eT>&
5709Mat<eT>::operator+=(const eGlue<T1, T2, eglue_type>& X)
5710 {
5711 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
5712
5713 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T1::elem_type >::no ));
5714 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T2::elem_type >::no ));
5715
5716 eglue_type::apply_inplace_plus(*this, X);
5717
5718 return *this;
5719 }
5720
5721
5722
5724template<typename eT>
5725template<typename T1, typename T2, typename eglue_type>
5726inline
5727Mat<eT>&
5728Mat<eT>::operator-=(const eGlue<T1, T2, eglue_type>& X)
5729 {
5730 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
5731
5732 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T1::elem_type >::no ));
5733 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T2::elem_type >::no ));
5734
5735 eglue_type::apply_inplace_minus(*this, X);
5736
5737 return *this;
5738 }

5745Mat<eT>&
5746Mat<eT>::operator*=(const eGlue<T1, T2, eglue_type>& X)
5747 {
5748 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
5749
5750 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T1::elem_type >::no ));
5751 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T2::elem_type >::no ));

5753 glue_times::apply_inplace(*this, X);
5754
5755 return *this;
5756 }

5760template<typename eT>
5761template<typename T1, typename T2, typename eglue_type>
5762inline
5763Mat<eT>&
5764Mat<eT>::operator%=(const eGlue<T1, T2, eglue_type>& X)
5765 {
5766 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
5767
5768 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T1::elem_type >::no ));
5769 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T2::elem_type >::no ));
5770
5771 eglue_type::apply_inplace_schur(*this, X);
5772
5773 return *this;
5774 }

5778template<typename eT>

5780inline
5781Mat<eT>&
5782Mat<eT>::operator/=(const eGlue<T1, T2, eglue_type>& X)
5783 {
5784 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
5785
5786 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T1::elem_type >::no ));
5787 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T2::elem_type >::no ));
5788
5789 eglue_type::apply_inplace_div(*this, X);
5790
5791 return *this;
5792 }

5798inline
5799Mat<eT>::Mat(const mtGlue<eT, T1, T2, glue_type>& X)
5800 : n_rows(0)
5801 , n_cols(0)
5802 , n_elem(0)
5803 , n_alloc(0)
5804 , vec_state(0)
5805 , mem_state(0)
5806 , mem()
5807 {
5808 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
5809
5810 glue_type::apply(*this, X);
5811 }

5908template<typename eT>
5909arma_inline
5910arma_warn_unused
5911const eT&
5912Mat<eT>::at_alt(const uword ii) const
5913 {
5914 const eT* mem_aligned = mem;
5915
5916 memory::mark_as_aligned(mem_aligned);
5917
5918 return mem_aligned[ii];
5919 }
5920

5922
5924template<typename eT>
5925arma_inline
5926arma_warn_unused
5927eT&
5928Mat<eT>::operator() (const uword ii)
5929 {
5930 arma_debug_check_bounds( (ii >= n_elem), "Mat::operator(): index out of bounds" );
5931
5932 return access::rw(mem[ii]);
5933 }
5934
5935

5939arma_inline
5940arma_warn_unused
5941const eT&
5942Mat<eT>::operator() (const uword ii) const
5943 {
5944 arma_debug_check_bounds( (ii >= n_elem), "Mat::operator(): index out of bounds" );
5945
5946 return mem[ii];
5947 }

5997
5999template<typename eT>
6000arma_inline
6001arma_warn_unused
6002eT&
6003Mat<eT>::operator() (const uword in_row, const uword in_col)
6004 {
6005 arma_debug_check_bounds( ((in_row >= n_rows) || (in_col >= n_cols)), "Mat::operator(): index out of bounds" );
6006
6007 return access::rw(mem[in_row + in_col*n_rows]);
6008 }
6009
6010
6011
6013template<typename eT>
6014arma_inline
6015arma_warn_unused
6016const eT&
6017Mat<eT>::operator() (const uword in_row, const uword in_col) const
6018 {
6019 arma_debug_check_bounds( ((in_row >= n_rows) || (in_col >= n_cols)), "Mat::operator(): index out of bounds" );
6020
6021 return mem[in_row + in_col*n_rows];
6022 }
6023
6024
6025
6027template<typename eT>
6028arma_inline
6029arma_warn_unused
6030eT&
6031Mat<eT>::at(const uword in_row, const uword in_col)
6032 {
6033 return access::rw( mem[in_row + in_col*n_rows] );
6034 }
6035
6036
6037
6039template<typename eT>
6040arma_inline
6041arma_warn_unused
6042const eT&
6043Mat<eT>::at(const uword in_row, const uword in_col) const
6044 {
6045 return mem[in_row + in_col*n_rows];
6046 }

6052arma_inline
6053const Mat<eT>&
6054Mat<eT>::operator++()
6055 {
6056 Mat_aux::prefix_pp(*this);
6057
6058 return *this;
6059 }
6060

6065arma_inline
6066void
6067Mat<eT>::operator++(int)
6068 {
6069 Mat_aux::postfix_pp(*this);
6070 }
6071

6076arma_inline
6077const Mat<eT>&
6078Mat<eT>::operator--()
6079 {

6081
6082 return *this;
6083 }

6091Mat<eT>::operator--(int)
6092 {
6093 Mat_aux::postfix_mm(*this);
6094 }

6097
6099template<typename eT>
6100arma_inline
6101arma_warn_unused
6102bool
6103Mat<eT>::is_empty() const
6104 {
6105 return (n_elem == 0);
6106 }
6107
6108
6109
6111template<typename eT>
6112arma_inline
6113arma_warn_unused
6114bool
6115Mat<eT>::is_vec() const
6116 {
6117 return ( (n_rows == 1) || (n_cols == 1) );
6118 }
6119
6120
6121
6123template<typename eT>
6124arma_inline
6125arma_warn_unused
6126bool
6127Mat<eT>::is_rowvec() const
6128 {
6129 return (n_rows == 1);
6130 }
6131
6132
6133
6135template<typename eT>
6136arma_inline
6137arma_warn_unused
6138bool
6139Mat<eT>::is_colvec() const
6140 {
6141 return (n_cols == 1);
6142 }
6143
6144
6145
6147template<typename eT>
6148arma_inline
6149arma_warn_unused
6150bool
6151Mat<eT>::is_square() const
6152 {
6153 return (n_rows == n_cols);
6154 }
6155
6156
6157
6159template<typename eT>
6160inline
6161arma_warn_unused
6162bool
6163Mat<eT>::is_finite() const
6164 {
6165 return arrayops::is_finite( memptr(), n_elem );
6166 }
6167
6168
6169
6170template<typename eT>
6171inline
6172arma_warn_unused
6173bool
6174Mat<eT>::has_inf() const
6175 {
6176 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
6177
6178 return arrayops::has_inf(memptr(), n_elem);
6179 }
6180
6181
6182
6183template<typename eT>
6184inline
6185arma_warn_unused
6186bool
6187Mat<eT>::has_nan() const
6188 {
6189 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
6190
6191 return arrayops::has_nan(memptr(), n_elem);
6192 }
6193
6194
6195
6196template<typename eT>
6197inline
6198arma_warn_unused
6199bool
6200Mat<eT>::is_sorted(const char* direction) const
6201 {
6202 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
6203
6204 return (*this).is_sorted(direction, (((vec_state == 2) || (n_rows == 1)) ? uword(1) : uword(0)));
6205 }
6206
6207
6208
6209template<typename eT>
6210inline
6211arma_warn_unused
6212bool
6213Mat<eT>::is_sorted(const char* direction, const uword dim) const
6214 {
6215 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
6216
6217 const char sig1 = (direction != nullptr) ? direction[0] : char(0);
6218
6219 // direction is one of:
6220 // "ascend"
6221 // "descend"
6222 // "strictascend"
6223 // "strictdescend"
6224
6225 arma_debug_check( ((sig1 != 'a') && (sig1 != 'd') && (sig1 != 's')), "Mat::is_sorted(): unknown sort direction" );
6226
6227 // "strictascend"
6228 // "strictdescend"
6229 // 0123456
6230
6231 const char sig2 = (sig1 == 's') ? direction[6] : char(0);
6232
6233 if(sig1 == 's') { arma_debug_check( ((sig2 != 'a') && (sig2 != 'd')), "Mat::is_sorted(): unknown sort direction" ); }
6234
6235 arma_debug_check( (dim > 1), "Mat::is_sorted(): parameter 'dim' must be 0 or 1" );
6236
6237 if(sig1 == 'a')
6238 {
6239 // case: ascend
6240
6241 // deliberately using the opposite direction comparator,
6242 // as we need to handle the case of two elements being equal
6243
6244 arma_gt_comparator<eT> comparator;
6245
6246 return (*this).is_sorted_helper(comparator, dim);
6247 }
6248 else
6249 if(sig1 == 'd')
6250 {
6251 // case: descend
6252
6253 // deliberately using the opposite direction comparator,
6254 // as we need to handle the case of two elements being equal
6255
6256 arma_lt_comparator<eT> comparator;
6257
6258 return (*this).is_sorted_helper(comparator, dim);
6259 }
6260 else
6261 if((sig1 == 's') && (sig2 == 'a'))
6262 {
6263 // case: strict ascend
6264
6265 arma_geq_comparator<eT> comparator;
6266
6267 return (*this).is_sorted_helper(comparator, dim);
6268 }
6269 else
6270 if((sig1 == 's') && (sig2 == 'd'))
6271 {
6272 // case: strict descend
6273
6274 arma_leq_comparator<eT> comparator;
6275
6276 return (*this).is_sorted_helper(comparator, dim);
6277 }
6278
6279 return true;
6280 }
6281
6282
6283
6284template<typename eT>
6285template<typename comparator>
6286inline
6287arma_warn_unused
6288bool
6289Mat<eT>::is_sorted_helper(const comparator& comp, const uword dim) const
6290 {
6291 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
6292
6293 if(n_elem <= 1) { return true; }
6294
6295 const uword local_n_cols = n_cols;
6296 const uword local_n_rows = n_rows;
6297
6298 if(dim == 0)
6299 {
6300 if(local_n_rows <= 1u) { return true; }
6301
6302 const uword local_n_rows_m1 = local_n_rows - 1;
6303
6304 for(uword c=0; c < local_n_cols; ++c)
6305 {
6306 const eT* coldata = colptr(c);
6307
6308 for(uword r=0; r < local_n_rows_m1; ++r)
6309 {
6310 const eT val1 = (*coldata); coldata++;
6311 const eT val2 = (*coldata);
6312
6313 if(comp(val1,val2)) { return false; }
6314 }
6315 }
6316 }
6317 else
6318 if(dim == 1)
6319 {
6320 if(local_n_cols <= 1u) { return true; }
6321
6322 const uword local_n_cols_m1 = local_n_cols - 1;
6323
6324 if(local_n_rows == 1)
6325 {
6326 const eT* rowdata = memptr();
6327
6328 for(uword c=0; c < local_n_cols_m1; ++c)
6329 {
6330 const eT val1 = (*rowdata); rowdata++;
6331 const eT val2 = (*rowdata);
6332
6333 if(comp(val1,val2)) { return false; }
6334 }
6335 }
6336 else
6337 {
6338 for(uword r=0; r < local_n_rows; ++r)
6339 for(uword c=0; c < local_n_cols_m1; ++c)
6340 {
6341 const eT val1 = at(r,c );
6342 const eT val2 = at(r,c+1);
6343
6344 if(comp(val1,val2)) { return false; }
6345 }
6346 }
6347 }
6348
6349 return true;
6350 }
6351
6352
6353
6355template<typename eT>
6356arma_inline
6357arma_warn_unused
6358bool
6359Mat<eT>::in_range(const uword ii) const
6360 {
6361 return (ii < n_elem);
6362 }
6363
6364
6365
6367template<typename eT>
6368arma_inline
6369arma_warn_unused
6370bool
6371Mat<eT>::in_range(const span& x) const
6372 {
6373 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
6374
6375 if(x.whole)
6376 {
6377 return true;
6378 }
6379 else
6380 {
6381 const uword a = x.a;
6382 const uword b = x.b;
6383
6384 return ( (a <= b) && (b < n_elem) );
6385 }
6386 }
6387
6388
6389
6391template<typename eT>
6392arma_inline
6393arma_warn_unused
6394bool
6395Mat<eT>::in_range(const uword in_row, const uword in_col) const
6396 {
6397 return ( (in_row < n_rows) && (in_col < n_cols) );
6398 }
6399
6400
6401
6402template<typename eT>
6403arma_inline
6404arma_warn_unused
6405bool
6406Mat<eT>::in_range(const span& row_span, const uword in_col) const
6407 {
6408 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
6409
6410 if(row_span.whole)
6411 {
6412 return (in_col < n_cols);
6413 }
6414 else
6415 {
6416 const uword in_row1 = row_span.a;
6417 const uword in_row2 = row_span.b;
6418
6419 return ( (in_row1 <= in_row2) && (in_row2 < n_rows) && (in_col < n_cols) );
6420 }
6421 }
6422
6423
6424
6425template<typename eT>
6426arma_inline
6427arma_warn_unused
6428bool
6429Mat<eT>::in_range(const uword in_row, const span& col_span) const
6430 {
6431 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
6432
6433 if(col_span.whole)
6434 {
6435 return (in_row < n_rows);
6436 }
6437 else
6438 {
6439 const uword in_col1 = col_span.a;
6440 const uword in_col2 = col_span.b;
6441
6442 return ( (in_row < n_rows) && (in_col1 <= in_col2) && (in_col2 < n_cols) );
6443 }
6444 }
6445
6446
6447
6448template<typename eT>
6449arma_inline
6450arma_warn_unused
6451bool
6452Mat<eT>::in_range(const span& row_span, const span& col_span) const
6453 {
6454 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
6455
6456 const uword in_row1 = row_span.a;
6457 const uword in_row2 = row_span.b;
6458
6459 const uword in_col1 = col_span.a;
6460 const uword in_col2 = col_span.b;
6461
6462 const bool rows_ok = row_span.whole ? true : ( (in_row1 <= in_row2) && (in_row2 < n_rows) );
6463 const bool cols_ok = col_span.whole ? true : ( (in_col1 <= in_col2) && (in_col2 < n_cols) );
6464
6465 return ( rows_ok && cols_ok );
6466 }
6467
6468
6469
6470template<typename eT>
6471arma_inline
6472arma_warn_unused
6473bool
6474Mat<eT>::in_range(const uword in_row, const uword in_col, const SizeMat& s) const
6475 {
6476 const uword l_n_rows = n_rows;
6477 const uword l_n_cols = n_cols;
6478
6479 if( (in_row >= l_n_rows) || (in_col >= l_n_cols) || ((in_row + s.n_rows) > l_n_rows) || ((in_col + s.n_cols) > l_n_cols) )
6480 {
6481 return false;
6482 }
6483 else
6484 {
6485 return true;
6486 }
6487 }
6488
6489
6490
6492template<typename eT>
6493arma_inline
6494arma_warn_unused
6495eT*
6496Mat<eT>::colptr(const uword in_col)
6497 {
6498 return & access::rw(mem[in_col*n_rows]);
6499 }
6500
6501
6502
6504template<typename eT>
6505arma_inline
6506arma_warn_unused
6507const eT*
6508Mat<eT>::colptr(const uword in_col) const
6509 {
6510 return & mem[in_col*n_rows];
6511 }
6512
6513
6514
6516template<typename eT>
6517arma_inline
6518arma_warn_unused
6519eT*
6520Mat<eT>::memptr()
6521 {
6522 return const_cast<eT*>(mem);
6523 }
6524
6525
6526
6528template<typename eT>
6529arma_inline
6530arma_warn_unused
6531const eT*
6532Mat<eT>::memptr() const
6533 {
6534 return mem;
6535 }
6536
6537
6538
6540template<typename eT>
6541inline
6542void
6543Mat<eT>::set_size(const uword in_elem)
6544 {
6545 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
6546
6547 switch(vec_state)
6548 {
6549 case 0:
6550 // fallthrough
6551 case 1:
6552 init_warm(in_elem, 1);
6553 break;
6554
6555 case 2:
6556 init_warm(1, in_elem);
6557 break;
6558
6559 default:
6560 ;
6561 }
6562 }
6563
6564
6565
6567template<typename eT>
6568inline
6569void
6570Mat<eT>::set_size(const uword in_rows, const uword in_cols)
6571 {
6572 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
6573
6574 init_warm(in_rows, in_cols);
6575 }
6576
6577
6578
6579template<typename eT>
6580inline
6581void
6582Mat<eT>::set_size(const SizeMat& s)
6583 {
6584 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
6585
6586 init_warm(s.n_rows, s.n_cols);
6587 }
6588
6589
6590
6592template<typename eT>
6593inline
6594void
6595Mat<eT>::resize(const uword in_elem)
6596 {
6597 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
6598
6599 switch(vec_state)
6600 {
6601 case 0:
6602 // fallthrough
6603 case 1:
6604 (*this).resize(in_elem, 1);
6605 break;
6606
6607 case 2:
6608 (*this).resize(1, in_elem);
6609 break;
6610
6611 default:
6612 ;
6613 }
6614 }
6615
6616
6617
6619template<typename eT>
6620inline
6621void
6622Mat<eT>::resize(const uword in_rows, const uword in_cols)
6623 {
6624 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
6625
6626 *this = arma::resize(*this, in_rows, in_cols);
6627 }
6628
6629
6630
6631template<typename eT>
6632inline
6633void
6634Mat<eT>::resize(const SizeMat& s)
6635 {
6636 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
6637
6638 *this = arma::resize(*this, s.n_rows, s.n_cols);
6639 }
6640
6641
6642
6644template<typename eT>
6645inline
6646void
6647Mat<eT>::reshape(const uword in_rows, const uword in_cols)
6648 {
6649 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
6650
6651 *this = arma::reshape(*this, in_rows, in_cols);
6652 }
6653
6654
6655
6656template<typename eT>
6657inline
6658void
6659Mat<eT>::reshape(const SizeMat& s)
6660 {
6661 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
6662
6663 *this = arma::reshape(*this, s.n_rows, s.n_cols);
6664 }
6665
6666
6667
6669template<typename eT>
6670arma_deprecated
6671inline
6672void
6673Mat<eT>::reshape(const uword in_rows, const uword in_cols, const uword dim)
6674 {
6675 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
6676
6677 // arma_debug_warn_level(1, "this form of reshape() is deprecated and will be removed");
6678
6679 arma_debug_check( (dim > 1), "reshape(): parameter 'dim' must be 0 or 1" );
6680
6681 if(dim == 0)
6682 {
6683 *this = arma::reshape(*this, in_rows, in_cols);
6684 }
6685 else
6686 if(dim == 1)
6687 {
6688 *this = arma::reshape(strans(*this), in_rows, in_cols);
6689 }
6690 }
6691
6692
6693
6695template<typename eT>
6696template<typename eT2, typename expr>
6697inline
6698void
6699Mat<eT>::copy_size(const Base<eT2, expr>& X)
6700 {
6701 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
6702
6703 const Proxy<expr> P(X.get_ref());
6704
6705 const uword X_n_rows = P.get_n_rows();
6706 const uword X_n_cols = P.get_n_cols();
6707
6708 init_warm(X_n_rows, X_n_cols);
6709 }
6710
6711
6712
6714template<typename eT>
6715template<typename functor>
6716inline
6717const Mat<eT>&
6718Mat<eT>::for_each(functor F)
6719 {
6720 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
6721
6722 eT* data = memptr();
6723
6724 const uword N = n_elem;
6725
6726 uword ii, jj;
6727
6728 for(ii=0, jj=1; jj < N; ii+=2, jj+=2)
6729 {
6730 F(data[ii]);
6731 F(data[jj]);
6732 }
6733
6734 if(ii < N)
6735 {
6736 F(data[ii]);
6737 }
6738
6739 return *this;
6740 }
6741
6742
6743
6744template<typename eT>
6745template<typename functor>
6746inline
6747const Mat<eT>&
6748Mat<eT>::for_each(functor F) const
6749 {
6750 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
6751
6752 const eT* data = memptr();
6753
6754 const uword N = n_elem;
6755
6756 uword ii, jj;
6757
6758 for(ii=0, jj=1; jj < N; ii+=2, jj+=2)
6759 {
6760 F(data[ii]);
6761 F(data[jj]);
6762 }
6763
6764 if(ii < N)
6765 {
6766 F(data[ii]);
6767 }
6768
6769 return *this;
6770 }
6771
6772
6773
6775template<typename eT>
6776template<typename functor>
6777inline
6778const Mat<eT>&
6779Mat<eT>::transform(functor F)
6780 {
6781 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
6782
6783 eT* out_mem = memptr();
6784
6785 const uword N = n_elem;
6786
6787 uword ii, jj;
6788
6789 for(ii=0, jj=1; jj < N; ii+=2, jj+=2)
6790 {
6791 eT tmp_ii = out_mem[ii];
6792 eT tmp_jj = out_mem[jj];
6793
6794 tmp_ii = eT( F(tmp_ii) );
6795 tmp_jj = eT( F(tmp_jj) );
6796
6797 out_mem[ii] = tmp_ii;
6798 out_mem[jj] = tmp_jj;
6799 }
6800
6801 if(ii < N)
6802 {
6803 out_mem[ii] = eT( F(out_mem[ii]) );
6804 }
6805
6806 return *this;
6807 }
6808
6809
6810
6812template<typename eT>
6813template<typename functor>
6814inline
6815const Mat<eT>&
6816Mat<eT>::imbue(functor F)
6817 {
6818 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
6819
6820 eT* out_mem = memptr();
6821
6822 const uword N = n_elem;
6823
6824 uword ii, jj;
6825
6826 for(ii=0, jj=1; jj < N; ii+=2, jj+=2)
6827 {
6828 const eT tmp_ii = eT( F() );
6829 const eT tmp_jj = eT( F() );
6830
6831 out_mem[ii] = tmp_ii;
6832 out_mem[jj] = tmp_jj;
6833 }
6834
6835 if(ii < N)
6836 {
6837 out_mem[ii] = eT( F() );
6838 }
6839
6840 return *this;
6841 }
6842
6843
6844
6845template<typename eT>
6846inline
6847const Mat<eT>&
6848Mat<eT>::replace(const eT old_val, const eT new_val)
6849 {
6850 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
6851
6852 arrayops::replace(memptr(), n_elem, old_val, new_val);
6853
6854 return *this;
6855 }
6856
6857
6858
6859template<typename eT>
6860inline
6861const Mat<eT>&
6862Mat<eT>::clean(const typename get_pod_type<eT>::result threshold)
6863 {
6864 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
6865
6866 arrayops::clean(memptr(), n_elem, threshold);
6867
6868 return *this;
6869 }
6870
6871
6872
6873template<typename eT>
6874inline
6875const Mat<eT>&
6876Mat<eT>::clamp(const eT min_val, const eT max_val)
6877 {
6878 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
6879
6880 if(is_cx<eT>::no)
6881 {
6882 arma_debug_check( (access::tmp_real(min_val) > access::tmp_real(max_val)), "Mat::clamp(): min_val must be less than max_val" );
6883 }
6884 else
6885 {
6886 arma_debug_check( (access::tmp_real(min_val) > access::tmp_real(max_val)), "Mat::clamp(): real(min_val) must be less than real(max_val)" );
6887 arma_debug_check( (access::tmp_imag(min_val) > access::tmp_imag(max_val)), "Mat::clamp(): imag(min_val) must be less than imag(max_val)" );
6888 }
6889
6890 arrayops::clamp(memptr(), n_elem, min_val, max_val);
6891
6892 return *this;
6893 }
6894
6895
6896
6898template<typename eT>
6899inline
6900const Mat<eT>&
6901Mat<eT>::fill(const eT val)
6902 {
6903 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
6904
6905 arrayops::inplace_set( memptr(), val, n_elem );
6906
6907 return *this;
6908 }
6909
6910
6911
6913template<typename eT>
6914template<typename fill_type>
6915inline
6916const Mat<eT>&
6917Mat<eT>::fill(const fill::fill_class<fill_type>&)
6918 {
6919 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
6920
6921 if(is_same_type<fill_type, fill::fill_zeros>::yes) { (*this).zeros(); }
6922 if(is_same_type<fill_type, fill::fill_ones >::yes) { (*this).ones(); }
6923 if(is_same_type<fill_type, fill::fill_eye >::yes) { (*this).eye(); }
6924 if(is_same_type<fill_type, fill::fill_randu>::yes) { (*this).randu(); }
6925 if(is_same_type<fill_type, fill::fill_randn>::yes) { (*this).randn(); }
6926
6927 return *this;
6928 }
6929
6930
6931
6932template<typename eT>
6933inline
6934const Mat<eT>&
6935Mat<eT>::zeros()
6936 {
6937 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
6938
6939 arrayops::fill_zeros(memptr(), n_elem);
6940
6941 return *this;
6942 }
6943
6944
6945
6946template<typename eT>
6947inline
6948const Mat<eT>&
6949Mat<eT>::zeros(const uword in_elem)
6950 {
6951 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
6952
6953 set_size(in_elem);
6954
6955 return (*this).zeros();
6956 }
6957

6964 {
6965 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
6966
6967 set_size(in_n_rows, in_n_cols);
6968
6969 return (*this).zeros();

6980
6981 return (*this).zeros(s.n_rows, s.n_cols);
6982 }

6992
6993 return fill(eT(1));
6994 }

7144
7145
7146template<typename eT>
7147inline
7148const Mat<eT>&
7149Mat<eT>::eye()
7150 {
7151 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
7152
7153 (*this).zeros();
7154
7155 const uword N = (std::min)(n_rows, n_cols);
7156
7157 for(uword ii=0; ii<N; ++ii) { at(ii,ii) = eT(1); }
7158
7159 return *this;
7160 }
7161
7162
7163
7164template<typename eT>
7165inline
7166const Mat<eT>&
7167Mat<eT>::eye(const uword in_rows, const uword in_cols)
7168 {
7169 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
7170
7171 set_size(in_rows, in_cols);
7172
7173 return (*this).eye();
7174 }
7175
7176
7177
7178template<typename eT>
7179inline
7180const Mat<eT>&
7181Mat<eT>::eye(const SizeMat& s)
7182 {
7183 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
7184
7185 return (*this).eye(s.n_rows, s.n_cols);
7186 }
7187
7188
7189
7190template<typename eT>
7191inline
7192arma_cold
7193void
7194Mat<eT>::reset()
7195 {
7196 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
7197
7198 const uword new_n_rows = (vec_state == 2) ? 1 : 0;
7199 const uword new_n_cols = (vec_state == 1) ? 1 : 0;
7200
7201 init_warm(new_n_rows, new_n_cols);
7202 }
7203
7204
7205
7206template<typename eT>
7207inline
7208arma_cold
7209void
7210Mat<eT>::soft_reset()
7211 {
7212 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
7213
7214 // don't change the size if the matrix has a fixed size or is a cube slice
7215 if(mem_state <= 1)
7216 {
7217 reset();
7218 }
7219 else
7220 {
7221 zeros();
7222 }
7223 }
7224
7225
7226
7227template<typename eT>
7228template<typename T1>
7229inline
7230void
7231Mat<eT>::set_real(const Base<typename Mat<eT>::pod_type,T1>& X)
7232 {
7233 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
7234
7235 Mat_aux::set_real(*this, X);
7236 }
7237
7238
7239
7240template<typename eT>
7241template<typename T1>
7242inline
7243void
7244Mat<eT>::set_imag(const Base<typename Mat<eT>::pod_type,T1>& X)
7245 {
7246 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
7247
7248 Mat_aux::set_imag(*this, X);
7249 }
7250
7251
7252
7253template<typename eT>
7254inline
7255arma_warn_unused
7256eT
7257Mat<eT>::min() const
7258 {
7259 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
7260
7261 if(n_elem == 0)
7262 {
7263 arma_debug_check(true, "Mat::min(): object has no elements");
7264
7265 return Datum<eT>::nan;
7266 }
7267
7268 return op_min::direct_min(memptr(), n_elem);
7269 }
7270
7271
7272
7273template<typename eT>
7274inline
7275arma_warn_unused
7276eT
7277Mat<eT>::max() const
7278 {
7279 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
7280
7281 if(n_elem == 0)
7282 {
7283 arma_debug_check(true, "Mat::max(): object has no elements");
7284
7285 return Datum<eT>::nan;
7286 }
7287
7288 return op_max::direct_max(memptr(), n_elem);
7289 }
7290
7291
7292
7293template<typename eT>
7294inline
7295eT
7296Mat<eT>::min(uword& index_of_min_val) const
7297 {
7298 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
7299
7300 if(n_elem == 0)
7301 {
7302 arma_debug_check(true, "Mat::min(): object has no elements");
7303
7304 index_of_min_val = uword(0);
7305
7306 return Datum<eT>::nan;
7307 }
7308
7309 return op_min::direct_min(memptr(), n_elem, index_of_min_val);
7310 }
7311
7312
7313
7314template<typename eT>
7315inline
7316eT
7317Mat<eT>::max(uword& index_of_max_val) const
7318 {
7319 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
7320
7321 if(n_elem == 0)
7322 {
7323 arma_debug_check(true, "Mat::max(): object has no elements");
7324
7325 index_of_max_val = uword(0);
7326
7327 return Datum<eT>::nan;
7328 }
7329
7330 return op_max::direct_max(memptr(), n_elem, index_of_max_val);
7331 }
7332
7333
7334
7335template<typename eT>
7336inline
7337eT
7338Mat<eT>::min(uword& row_of_min_val, uword& col_of_min_val) const
7339 {
7340 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
7341
7342 if(n_elem == 0)
7343 {
7344 arma_debug_check(true, "Mat::min(): object has no elements");
7345
7346 row_of_min_val = uword(0);
7347 col_of_min_val = uword(0);
7348
7349 return Datum<eT>::nan;
7350 }
7351
7352 uword iq;
7353
7354 eT val = op_min::direct_min(memptr(), n_elem, iq);
7355
7356 row_of_min_val = iq % n_rows;
7357 col_of_min_val = iq / n_rows;
7358
7359 return val;
7360 }
7361
7362
7363
7364template<typename eT>
7365inline
7366eT
7367Mat<eT>::max(uword& row_of_max_val, uword& col_of_max_val) const
7368 {
7369 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
7370
7371 if(n_elem == 0)
7372 {
7373 arma_debug_check(true, "Mat::max(): object has no elements");
7374
7375 row_of_max_val = uword(0);
7376 col_of_max_val = uword(0);
7377
7378 return Datum<eT>::nan;
7379 }
7380
7381 uword iq;
7382
7383 eT val = op_max::direct_max(memptr(), n_elem, iq);
7384
7385 row_of_max_val = iq % n_rows;
7386 col_of_max_val = iq / n_rows;
7387
7388 return val;
7389 }
7390
7391
7392
7394template<typename eT>
7395inline
7396arma_cold
7397bool
7398Mat<eT>::save(const std::string name, const file_type type) const
7399 {
7400 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
7401
7402 bool save_okay = false;
7403
7404 switch(type)
7405 {
7406 case raw_ascii:
7407 save_okay = diskio::save_raw_ascii(*this, name);
7408 break;
7409
7410 case arma_ascii:
7411 save_okay = diskio::save_arma_ascii(*this, name);
7412 break;
7413
7414 case csv_ascii:
7415 return (*this).save(csv_name(name), type);
7416 break;
7417
7418 case coord_ascii:
7419 save_okay = diskio::save_coord_ascii(*this, name);
7420 break;
7421
7422 case raw_binary:
7423 save_okay = diskio::save_raw_binary(*this, name);
7424 break;
7425
7426 case arma_binary:
7427 save_okay = diskio::save_arma_binary(*this, name);
7428 break;
7429
7430 case pgm_binary:
7431 save_okay = diskio::save_pgm_binary(*this, name);
7432 break;
7433
7434 case hdf5_binary:
7435 return (*this).save(hdf5_name(name));
7436 break;
7437
7438 case hdf5_binary_trans: // kept for compatibility with earlier versions of Armadillo
7439 return (*this).save(hdf5_name(name, std::string(), hdf5_opts::trans));
7440 break;
7441
7442 default:
7443 arma_debug_warn_level(1, "Mat::save(): unsupported file type");
7444 save_okay = false;
7445 }
7446
7447 if(save_okay == false) { arma_debug_warn_level(3, "Mat::save(): couldn't write; file: ", name); }
7448
7449 return save_okay;
7450 }
7451
7452
7453
7454template<typename eT>
7455inline
7456arma_cold
7457bool
7458Mat<eT>::save(const hdf5_name& spec, const file_type type) const
7459 {
7460 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
7461
7462 // handling of hdf5_binary_trans kept for compatibility with earlier versions of Armadillo
7463
7464 if( (type != hdf5_binary) && (type != hdf5_binary_trans) )
7465 {
7466 arma_stop_runtime_error("Mat::save(): unsupported file type for hdf5_name()");
7467 return false;
7468 }
7469
7470 const bool do_trans = bool(spec.opts.flags & hdf5_opts::flag_trans ) || (type == hdf5_binary_trans);
7471 const bool append = bool(spec.opts.flags & hdf5_opts::flag_append );
7472 const bool replace = bool(spec.opts.flags & hdf5_opts::flag_replace);
7473
7474 if(append && replace)
7475 {
7476 arma_stop_runtime_error("Mat::save(): only one of 'append' or 'replace' options can be used");
7477 return false;
7478 }
7479
7480 bool save_okay = false;
7481
7482 std::string err_msg;
7483
7484 if(do_trans)
7485 {
7486 Mat<eT> tmp;
7487
7488 op_strans::apply_mat_noalias(tmp, *this);
7489
7490 save_okay = diskio::save_hdf5_binary(tmp, spec, err_msg);
7491 }
7492 else
7493 {
7494 save_okay = diskio::save_hdf5_binary(*this, spec, err_msg);
7495 }
7496
7497 if(save_okay == false)
7498 {
7499 if(err_msg.length() > 0)
7500 {
7501 arma_debug_warn_level(3, "Mat::save(): ", err_msg, "; file: ", spec.filename);
7502 }
7503 else
7504 {
7505 arma_debug_warn_level(3, "Mat::save(): couldn't write; file: ", spec.filename);
7506 }
7507 }
7508
7509 return save_okay;
7510 }
7511
7512
7513
7514template<typename eT>
7515inline
7516arma_cold
7517bool
7518Mat<eT>::save(const csv_name& spec, const file_type type) const
7519 {
7520 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
7521
7522 if(type != csv_ascii)
7523 {
7524 arma_stop_runtime_error("Mat::save(): unsupported file type for csv_name()");
7525 return false;
7526 }
7527
7528 const bool do_trans = bool(spec.opts.flags & csv_opts::flag_trans );
7529 const bool no_header = bool(spec.opts.flags & csv_opts::flag_no_header );
7530 bool with_header = bool(spec.opts.flags & csv_opts::flag_with_header);
7531
7532 arma_extra_debug_print("Mat::save(csv_name): enabled flags:");
7533
7534 if(do_trans ) { arma_extra_debug_print("trans"); }
7535 if(no_header ) { arma_extra_debug_print("no_header"); }
7536 if(with_header) { arma_extra_debug_print("with_header"); }
7537
7538 if(no_header) { with_header = false; }
7539
7540 if(with_header)
7541 {
7542 if( (spec.header_ro.n_cols != 1) && (spec.header_ro.n_rows != 1) )
7543 {
7544 arma_debug_warn_level(1, "Mat::save(): given header must have a vector layout");
7545 return false;
7546 }
7547
7548 for(uword i=0; i < spec.header_ro.n_elem; ++i)
7549 {
7550 const std::string& token = spec.header_ro.at(i);
7551
7552 if(token.find(',') != std::string::npos)
7553 {
7554 arma_debug_warn_level(1, "Mat::save(): token within the header contains a comma: '", token, "'");
7555 return false;
7556 }
7557 }
7558
7559 const uword save_n_cols = (do_trans) ? (*this).n_rows : (*this).n_cols;
7560
7561 if(spec.header_ro.n_elem != save_n_cols)
7562 {
7563 arma_debug_warn_level(1, "Mat::save(): size mistmach between header and matrix");
7564 return false;
7565 }
7566 }
7567
7568 bool save_okay = false;
7569
7570 if(do_trans)
7571 {
7572 const Mat<eT> tmp = (*this).st();
7573
7574 save_okay = diskio::save_csv_ascii(tmp, spec.filename, spec.header_ro, with_header);
7575 }
7576 else
7577 {
7578 save_okay = diskio::save_csv_ascii(*this, spec.filename, spec.header_ro, with_header);
7579 }
7580
7581 if(save_okay == false) { arma_debug_warn_level(3, "Mat::save(): couldn't write; file: ", spec.filename); }
7582
7583 return save_okay;
7584 }
7585
7586
7587
7589template<typename eT>
7590inline
7591arma_cold
7592bool
7593Mat<eT>::save(std::ostream& os, const file_type type) const
7594 {
7595 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
7596
7597 bool save_okay = false;
7598
7599 switch(type)
7600 {
7601 case raw_ascii:
7602 save_okay = diskio::save_raw_ascii(*this, os);
7603 break;
7604
7605 case arma_ascii:
7606 save_okay = diskio::save_arma_ascii(*this, os);
7607 break;
7608
7609 case csv_ascii:
7610 save_okay = diskio::save_csv_ascii(*this, os);
7611 break;
7612
7613 case coord_ascii:
7614 save_okay = diskio::save_coord_ascii(*this, os);
7615 break;
7616
7617 case raw_binary:
7618 save_okay = diskio::save_raw_binary(*this, os);
7619 break;
7620
7621 case arma_binary:
7622 save_okay = diskio::save_arma_binary(*this, os);
7623 break;
7624
7625 case pgm_binary:
7626 save_okay = diskio::save_pgm_binary(*this, os);
7627 break;
7628
7629 default:
7630 arma_debug_warn_level(1, "Mat::save(): unsupported file type");
7631 save_okay = false;
7632 }
7633
7634 if(save_okay == false) { arma_debug_warn_level(3, "Mat::save(): couldn't write to stream"); }
7635
7636 return save_okay;
7637 }
7638
7639
7640
7642template<typename eT>
7643inline
7644arma_cold
7645bool
7646Mat<eT>::load(const std::string name, const file_type type)
7647 {
7648 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
7649
7650 bool load_okay = false;
7651 std::string err_msg;
7652
7653 switch(type)
7654 {
7655 case auto_detect:
7656 load_okay = diskio::load_auto_detect(*this, name, err_msg);
7657 break;
7658
7659 case raw_ascii:
7660 load_okay = diskio::load_raw_ascii(*this, name, err_msg);
7661 break;
7662
7663 case arma_ascii:
7664 load_okay = diskio::load_arma_ascii(*this, name, err_msg);
7665 break;
7666
7667 case csv_ascii:
7668 return (*this).load(csv_name(name), type);
7669 break;
7670
7671 case coord_ascii:
7672 load_okay = diskio::load_coord_ascii(*this, name, err_msg);
7673 break;
7674
7675 case raw_binary:
7676 load_okay = diskio::load_raw_binary(*this, name, err_msg);
7677 break;
7678
7679 case arma_binary:
7680 load_okay = diskio::load_arma_binary(*this, name, err_msg);
7681 break;
7682
7683 case pgm_binary:
7684 load_okay = diskio::load_pgm_binary(*this, name, err_msg);
7685 break;
7686
7687 case hdf5_binary:
7688 return (*this).load(hdf5_name(name));
7689 break;
7690
7691 case hdf5_binary_trans: // kept for compatibility with earlier versions of Armadillo
7692 return (*this).load(hdf5_name(name, std::string(), hdf5_opts::trans));
7693 break;
7694
7695 default:
7696 arma_debug_warn_level(1, "Mat::load(): unsupported file type");
7697 load_okay = false;
7698 }
7699
7700 if(load_okay == false)
7701 {
7702 if(err_msg.length() > 0)
7703 {
7704 arma_debug_warn_level(3, "Mat::load(): ", err_msg, "; file: ", name);
7705 }
7706 else
7707 {
7708 arma_debug_warn_level(3, "Mat::load(): couldn't read; file: ", name);
7709 }
7710 }
7711
7712 if(load_okay == false) { (*this).soft_reset(); }
7713
7714 return load_okay;
7715 }
7716
7717
7718
7719template<typename eT>
7720inline
7721arma_cold
7722bool
7723Mat<eT>::load(const hdf5_name& spec, const file_type type)
7724 {
7725 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
7726
7727 if( (type != hdf5_binary) && (type != hdf5_binary_trans) )
7728 {
7729 arma_stop_runtime_error("Mat::load(): unsupported file type for hdf5_name()");
7730 return false;
7731 }
7732
7733 bool load_okay = false;
7734 std::string err_msg;
7735
7736 const bool do_trans = bool(spec.opts.flags & hdf5_opts::flag_trans) || (type == hdf5_binary_trans);
7737
7738 if(do_trans)
7739 {
7740 Mat<eT> tmp;
7741
7742 load_okay = diskio::load_hdf5_binary(tmp, spec, err_msg);
7743
7744 if(load_okay) { op_strans::apply_mat_noalias(*this, tmp); }
7745 }
7746 else
7747 {
7748 load_okay = diskio::load_hdf5_binary(*this, spec, err_msg);
7749 }
7750
7751
7752 if(load_okay == false)
7753 {
7754 if(err_msg.length() > 0)
7755 {
7756 arma_debug_warn_level(3, "Mat::load(): ", err_msg, "; file: ", spec.filename);
7757 }
7758 else
7759 {
7760 arma_debug_warn_level(3, "Mat::load(): couldn't read; file: ", spec.filename);
7761 }
7762 }
7763
7764 if(load_okay == false) { (*this).soft_reset(); }
7765
7766 return load_okay;
7767 }
7768
7769
7770
7771template<typename eT>
7772inline
7773arma_cold
7774bool
7775Mat<eT>::load(const csv_name& spec, const file_type type)
7776 {
7777 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
7778
7779 if(type != csv_ascii)
7780 {
7781 arma_stop_runtime_error("Mat::load(): unsupported file type for csv_name()");
7782 return false;
7783 }
7784
7785 const bool do_trans = bool(spec.opts.flags & csv_opts::flag_trans );
7786 const bool no_header = bool(spec.opts.flags & csv_opts::flag_no_header );
7787 bool with_header = bool(spec.opts.flags & csv_opts::flag_with_header);
7788
7789 arma_extra_debug_print("Mat::load(csv_name): enabled flags:");
7790
7791 if(do_trans ) { arma_extra_debug_print("trans"); }
7792 if(no_header ) { arma_extra_debug_print("no_header"); }
7793 if(with_header) { arma_extra_debug_print("with_header"); }
7794
7795 if(no_header) { with_header = false; }
7796
7797 bool load_okay = false;
7798 std::string err_msg;
7799
7800 if(do_trans)
7801 {
7802 Mat<eT> tmp_mat;
7803
7804 load_okay = diskio::load_csv_ascii(tmp_mat, spec.filename, err_msg, spec.header_rw, with_header);
7805
7806 if(load_okay)
7807 {
7808 (*this) = tmp_mat.st();
7809
7810 if(with_header)
7811 {
7812 // field::set_size() preserves data if the number of elements hasn't changed
7813 spec.header_rw.set_size(spec.header_rw.n_elem, 1);
7814 }
7815 }
7816 }
7817 else
7818 {
7819 load_okay = diskio::load_csv_ascii(*this, spec.filename, err_msg, spec.header_rw, with_header);
7820 }
7821
7822 if(load_okay == false)
7823 {
7824 if(err_msg.length() > 0)
7825 {
7826 arma_debug_warn_level(3, "Mat::load(): ", err_msg, "; file: ", spec.filename);
7827 }
7828 else
7829 {
7830 arma_debug_warn_level(3, "Mat::load(): couldn't read; file: ", spec.filename);
7831 }
7832 }
7833 else
7834 {
7835 const uword load_n_cols = (do_trans) ? (*this).n_rows : (*this).n_cols;
7836
7837 if(with_header && (spec.header_rw.n_elem != load_n_cols))
7838 {
7839 arma_debug_warn_level(3, "Mat::load(): size mistmach between header and matrix");
7840 }
7841 }
7842
7843 if(load_okay == false)
7844 {
7845 (*this).soft_reset();
7846
7847 if(with_header) { spec.header_rw.reset(); }
7848 }
7849
7850 return load_okay;
7851 }
7852
7853
7854
7856template<typename eT>
7857inline
7858arma_cold
7859bool
7860Mat<eT>::load(std::istream& is, const file_type type)
7861 {
7862 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
7863
7864 bool load_okay = false;
7865 std::string err_msg;
7866
7867 switch(type)
7868 {
7869 case auto_detect:
7870 load_okay = diskio::load_auto_detect(*this, is, err_msg);
7871 break;
7872
7873 case raw_ascii:
7874 load_okay = diskio::load_raw_ascii(*this, is, err_msg);
7875 break;
7876
7877 case arma_ascii:
7878 load_okay = diskio::load_arma_ascii(*this, is, err_msg);
7879 break;
7880
7881 case csv_ascii:
7882 load_okay = diskio::load_csv_ascii(*this, is, err_msg);
7883 break;
7884
7885 case coord_ascii:
7886 load_okay = diskio::load_coord_ascii(*this, is, err_msg);
7887 break;
7888
7889 case raw_binary:
7890 load_okay = diskio::load_raw_binary(*this, is, err_msg);
7891 break;
7892
7893 case arma_binary:
7894 load_okay = diskio::load_arma_binary(*this, is, err_msg);
7895 break;
7896
7897 case pgm_binary:
7898 load_okay = diskio::load_pgm_binary(*this, is, err_msg);
7899 break;
7900
7901 default:
7902 arma_debug_warn_level(1, "Mat::load(): unsupported file type");
7903 load_okay = false;
7904 }
7905
7906 if(load_okay == false)
7907 {
7908 if(err_msg.length() > 0)
7909 {
7910 arma_debug_warn_level(3, "Mat::load(): ", err_msg);
7911 }
7912 else
7913 {
7914 arma_debug_warn_level(3, "Mat::load(): couldn't load from stream");
7915 }
7916 }
7917
7918 if(load_okay == false) { (*this).soft_reset(); }
7919
7920 return load_okay;
7921 }
7922
7923

7927inline
7928arma_cold
7929bool
7930Mat<eT>::quiet_save(const std::string name, const file_type type) const
7931 {
7932 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
7933
7934 return (*this).save(name, type);
7935 }

7944 {
7945 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
7946
7947 return (*this).save(spec, type);
7948 }

8000

8022arma_cold
8023bool
8024Mat<eT>::quiet_load(std::istream& is, const file_type type)

8030
8031
8032
8033template<typename eT>
8034inline
8035Mat<eT>::row_iterator::row_iterator()
8036 : M (nullptr)
8037 , current_row(0 )
8038 , current_col(0 )
8039 {
8040 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
8041
8042 // NOTE: this instance of row_iterator is invalid (it does not point to a valid element)
8043 }
8044
8045
8046
8047template<typename eT>
8048inline
8049Mat<eT>::row_iterator::row_iterator(const row_iterator& X)
8050 : M (X.M )
8051 , current_row(X.current_row)
8052 , current_col(X.current_col)
8053 {
8054 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
8055 }
8056
8057
8058
8059template<typename eT>
8060inline
8061Mat<eT>::row_iterator::row_iterator(Mat<eT>& in_M, const uword in_row, const uword in_col)
8062 : M (&in_M )
8063 , current_row(in_row)
8064 , current_col(in_col)
8065 {
8066 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
8067 }
8068
8069
8070
8071template<typename eT>
8072inline
8073arma_warn_unused
8074eT&
8075Mat<eT>::row_iterator::operator*()
8076 {
8077 return M->at(current_row,current_col);
8078 }
8079
8080
8081
8082template<typename eT>
8083inline
8084typename Mat<eT>::row_iterator&
8085Mat<eT>::row_iterator::operator++()
8086 {
8087 current_col++;
8088
8089 if(current_col == M->n_cols)
8090 {
8091 current_col = 0;
8092 current_row++;
8093 }
8094
8095 return *this;
8096 }
8097
8098
8099
8100template<typename eT>
8101inline
8102arma_warn_unused
8103typename Mat<eT>::row_iterator
8104Mat<eT>::row_iterator::operator++(int)
8105 {
8106 typename Mat<eT>::row_iterator temp(*this);
8107
8108 ++(*this);
8109
8110 return temp;
8111 }
8112
8113
8114
8115template<typename eT>
8116inline
8117typename Mat<eT>::row_iterator&
8118Mat<eT>::row_iterator::operator--()
8119 {
8120 if(current_col > 0)
8121 {
8122 current_col--;
8123 }
8124 else
8125 {
8126 if(current_row > 0)
8127 {
8128 current_col = M->n_cols - 1;
8129 current_row--;
8130 }
8131 }
8132
8133 return *this;
8134 }
8135
8136
8137
8138template<typename eT>
8139inline
8140arma_warn_unused
8141typename Mat<eT>::row_iterator
8142Mat<eT>::row_iterator::operator--(int)
8143 {
8144 typename Mat<eT>::row_iterator temp(*this);
8145
8146 --(*this);
8147
8148 return temp;
8149 }
8150
8151
8152
8153template<typename eT>
8154inline
8155arma_warn_unused
8156bool
8157Mat<eT>::row_iterator::operator!=(const typename Mat<eT>::row_iterator& X) const
8158 {
8159 return ( (current_row != X.current_row) || (current_col != X.current_col) );
8160 }
8161
8162
8163
8164template<typename eT>
8165inline
8166arma_warn_unused
8167bool
8168Mat<eT>::row_iterator::operator==(const typename Mat<eT>::row_iterator& X) const
8169 {
8170 return ( (current_row == X.current_row) && (current_col == X.current_col) );
8171 }
8172

8180 {

8182 }

8193 }

8197template<typename eT>
8198inline
8199Mat<eT>::const_row_iterator::const_row_iterator()
8200 : M (nullptr)
8201 , current_row(0 )
8202 , current_col(0 )
8203 {
8204 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
8205
8206 // NOTE: this instance of const_row_iterator is invalid (it does not point to a valid element)
8207 }
8208

8216 , current_col(X.current_col)

8240 , current_col(in_col)

8247template<typename eT>
8248inline
8249arma_warn_unused
8250const eT&
8251Mat<eT>::const_row_iterator::operator*() const
8252 {
8253 return M->at(current_row,current_col);
8254 }
8255
8256
8257
8258template<typename eT>
8259inline
8260typename Mat<eT>::const_row_iterator&
8261Mat<eT>::const_row_iterator::operator++()
8262 {
8263 current_col++;
8264
8265 if(current_col == M->n_cols)
8266 {
8267 current_col = 0;
8268 current_row++;
8269 }
8270
8271 return *this;
8272 }
8273
8274
8275
8276template<typename eT>
8277inline
8278arma_warn_unused
8279typename Mat<eT>::const_row_iterator
8280Mat<eT>::const_row_iterator::operator++(int)
8281 {
8282 typename Mat<eT>::const_row_iterator temp(*this);
8283
8284 ++(*this);
8285
8286 return temp;
8287 }
8288
8289
8290
8291template<typename eT>
8292inline
8293typename Mat<eT>::const_row_iterator&
8294Mat<eT>::const_row_iterator::operator--()
8295 {
8296 if(current_col > 0)
8297 {
8298 current_col--;
8299 }
8300 else
8301 {
8302 if(current_row > 0)
8303 {
8304 current_col = M->n_cols - 1;
8305 current_row--;
8306 }
8307 }
8308
8309 return *this;
8310 }
8311
8312
8313
8314template<typename eT>
8315inline
8316arma_warn_unused
8317typename Mat<eT>::const_row_iterator
8318Mat<eT>::const_row_iterator::operator--(int)
8319 {
8320 typename Mat<eT>::const_row_iterator temp(*this);
8321
8322 --(*this);
8323
8324 return temp;
8325 }

8377 , current_ptr(nullptr)
8378 , current_col(0 )
8379 , current_row(0 )
8380 {

8400template<typename eT>
8401inline
8402Mat<eT>::row_col_iterator::row_col_iterator(Mat<eT>& in_M, const uword in_row, const uword in_col)
8403 : M (&in_M )
8404 , current_ptr(&in_M.at(in_row,in_col))
8405 , current_col(in_col )
8406 , current_row(in_row )
8407 {
8408 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
8409 }
8410
8411
8412
8413template<typename eT>
8414inline
8415arma_warn_unused
8416eT&
8417Mat<eT>::row_col_iterator::operator*()
8418 {
8419 return *current_ptr;
8420 }
8421
8422
8423
8424template<typename eT>
8425inline
8426typename Mat<eT>::row_col_iterator&
8427Mat<eT>::row_col_iterator::operator++()
8428 {
8429 if(current_col < M->n_cols)
8430 {
8431 current_ptr++;
8432 current_row++;
8433
8434 // Check to see if we moved a column.
8435 if(current_row == M->n_rows)
8436 {
8437 current_col++;
8438 current_row = 0;
8439 }
8440 }
8441
8442 return *this;
8443 }
8444
8445
8446
8447template<typename eT>
8448inline
8449arma_warn_unused
8450typename Mat<eT>::row_col_iterator
8451Mat<eT>::row_col_iterator::operator++(int)
8452 {
8453 typename Mat<eT>::row_col_iterator temp(*this);
8454
8455 ++(*this);
8456
8457 return temp;
8458 }
8459
8460
8461
8462template<typename eT>
8463inline typename Mat<eT>::row_col_iterator&
8464Mat<eT>::row_col_iterator::operator--()
8465 {
8466 if(current_row > 0)
8467 {
8468 current_ptr--;
8469 current_row--;
8470 }
8471 else
8472 if(current_col > 0)
8473 {
8474 current_ptr--;
8475 current_col--;
8476 current_row = M->n_rows - 1;
8477 }
8478
8479 return *this;
8480 }
8481
8482
8483
8484template<typename eT>
8485inline
8486arma_warn_unused
8487typename Mat<eT>::row_col_iterator
8488Mat<eT>::row_col_iterator::operator--(int)
8489 {
8490 typename Mat<eT>::row_col_iterator temp(*this);
8491
8492 --(*this);
8493
8494 return temp;
8495 }
8496

8504 {

8629template<typename eT>
8630inline
8631typename Mat<eT>::const_row_col_iterator&
8632Mat<eT>::const_row_col_iterator::operator++()
8633 {
8634 if(current_col < M->n_cols)
8635 {
8636 current_ptr++;
8637 current_row++;
8638
8639 // Check to see if we moved a column.
8640 if(current_row == M->n_rows)
8641 {
8642 current_col++;
8643 current_row = 0;
8644 }
8645 }
8646
8647 return *this;
8648 }

8658 typename Mat<eT>::const_row_col_iterator temp(*this);
8659

8661

8663 }

8667template<typename eT>
8668inline
8669typename Mat<eT>::const_row_col_iterator&
8670Mat<eT>::const_row_col_iterator::operator--()
8671 {
8672 if(current_row > 0)
8673 {
8674 current_ptr--;
8675 current_row--;
8676 }
8677 else
8678 if(current_col > 0)
8679 {
8680 current_ptr--;
8681 current_col--;
8682 current_row = M->n_rows - 1;
8683 }
8684
8685 return *this;
8686 }

8777
8778 return memptr();
8779 }

8801
8802 return memptr();
8803 }

8809typename Mat<eT>::iterator
8810Mat<eT>::end()
8811 {
8812 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
8813
8814 return memptr() + n_elem;
8815 }

8842
8843template<typename eT>
8844inline
8845typename Mat<eT>::col_iterator
8846Mat<eT>::begin_col(const uword col_num)
8847 {
8848 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
8849
8850 arma_debug_check_bounds( (col_num >= n_cols), "Mat::begin_col(): index out of bounds" );
8851
8852 return colptr(col_num);
8853 }
8854
8855
8856
8857template<typename eT>
8858inline
8859typename Mat<eT>::const_col_iterator
8860Mat<eT>::begin_col(const uword col_num) const
8861 {
8862 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
8863
8864 arma_debug_check_bounds( (col_num >= n_cols), "Mat::begin_col(): index out of bounds" );
8865
8866 return colptr(col_num);
8867 }
8868
8869
8870
8871template<typename eT>
8872inline
8873typename Mat<eT>::col_iterator
8874Mat<eT>::end_col(const uword col_num)
8875 {
8876 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
8877
8878 arma_debug_check_bounds( (col_num >= n_cols), "Mat::end_col(): index out of bounds" );
8879
8880 return colptr(col_num) + n_rows;
8881 }
8882
8883
8884
8885template<typename eT>
8886inline
8887typename Mat<eT>::const_col_iterator
8888Mat<eT>::end_col(const uword col_num) const
8889 {
8890 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
8891
8892 arma_debug_check_bounds( (col_num >= n_cols), "Mat::end_col(): index out of bounds" );
8893
8894 return colptr(col_num) + n_rows;
8895 }
8896
8897
8898
8899template<typename eT>
8900inline
8901typename Mat<eT>::row_iterator
8902Mat<eT>::begin_row(const uword row_num)
8903 {
8904 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
8905
8906 arma_debug_check_bounds( (row_num >= n_rows), "Mat::begin_row(): index out of bounds" );
8907
8908 return typename Mat<eT>::row_iterator(*this, row_num, uword(0));
8909 }
8910
8911
8912
8913template<typename eT>
8914inline
8915typename Mat<eT>::const_row_iterator
8916Mat<eT>::begin_row(const uword row_num) const
8917 {
8918 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
8919
8920 arma_debug_check_bounds( (row_num >= n_rows), "Mat::begin_row(): index out of bounds" );
8921
8922 return typename Mat<eT>::const_row_iterator(*this, row_num, uword(0));
8923 }
8924
8925
8926
8927template<typename eT>
8928inline
8929typename Mat<eT>::row_iterator
8930Mat<eT>::end_row(const uword row_num)
8931 {
8932 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
8933
8934 arma_debug_check_bounds( (row_num >= n_rows), "Mat::end_row(): index out of bounds" );
8935
8936 return typename Mat<eT>::row_iterator(*this, (row_num + uword(1)), 0);
8937 }
8938
8939
8940
8941template<typename eT>
8942inline
8943typename Mat<eT>::const_row_iterator
8944Mat<eT>::end_row(const uword row_num) const
8945 {
8946 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
8947
8948 arma_debug_check_bounds( (row_num >= n_rows), "Mat::end_row(): index out of bounds" );
8949
8950 return typename Mat<eT>::const_row_iterator(*this, (row_num + uword(1)), 0);
8951 }

8953
8954
8955template<typename eT>
8956inline
8957typename Mat<eT>::row_col_iterator
8958Mat<eT>::begin_row_col()
8959 {
8960 return row_col_iterator(*this);
8961 }
8962
8963
8964
8965template<typename eT>
8966inline
8967typename Mat<eT>::const_row_col_iterator
8968Mat<eT>::begin_row_col() const
8969 {
8970 return const_row_col_iterator(*this);
8971 }
8972
8973
8974
8975template<typename eT>
8976inline typename Mat<eT>::row_col_iterator
8977Mat<eT>::end_row_col()
8978 {
8979 return row_col_iterator(*this, 0, n_cols);
8980 }
8981
8982
8983
8984template<typename eT>
8985inline typename Mat<eT>::const_row_col_iterator
8986Mat<eT>::end_row_col() const
8987 {
8988 return const_row_col_iterator(*this, 0, n_cols);
8989 }
8990
8991
8992
8994template<typename eT>
8995inline
8996void
8997Mat<eT>::clear()
8998 {
8999 reset();
9000 }
9001
9002
9003
9005template<typename eT>
9006inline
9007bool
9008Mat<eT>::empty() const
9009 {
9010 return (n_elem == 0);
9011 }
9012
9013
9014
9016template<typename eT>
9017inline
9018uword
9019Mat<eT>::size() const
9020 {
9021 return n_elem;
9022 }
9023
9024
9025
9026template<typename eT>
9027inline
9028eT&
9029Mat<eT>::front()
9030 {
9031 arma_debug_check( (n_elem == 0), "Mat::front(): matrix is empty" );
9032
9033 return access::rw(mem[0]);
9034 }
9035
9036
9037
9038template<typename eT>
9039inline
9040const eT&
9041Mat<eT>::front() const
9042 {
9043 arma_debug_check( (n_elem == 0), "Mat::front(): matrix is empty" );
9044
9045 return mem[0];
9046 }
9047
9048
9049
9050template<typename eT>
9051inline
9052eT&
9053Mat<eT>::back()
9054 {
9055 arma_debug_check( (n_elem == 0), "Mat::back(): matrix is empty" );
9056
9057 return access::rw(mem[n_elem-1]);
9058 }
9059
9060
9061
9062template<typename eT>
9063inline
9064const eT&
9065Mat<eT>::back() const
9066 {
9067 arma_debug_check( (n_elem == 0), "Mat::back(): matrix is empty" );
9068
9069 return mem[n_elem-1];
9070 }
9071
9072
9073
9074template<typename eT>
9075template<uword fixed_n_rows, uword fixed_n_cols>
9076arma_inline
9077Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::fixed()
9078 : Mat<eT>( arma_fixed_indicator(), fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols, 0, ((use_extra) ? mem_local_extra : Mat<eT>::mem_local) )
9079 {
9080 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
9081
9082 #if (!defined(ARMA_DONT_ZERO_INIT))
9083 {
9084 arma_extra_debug_print("Mat::fixed::constructor: zeroing memory");
9085
9086 eT* mem_use = (use_extra) ? &(mem_local_extra[0]) : &(mem_local[0]);
9087
9088 arrayops::inplace_set_fixed<eT,fixed_n_elem>( mem_use, eT(0) );
9089 }
9090 #endif
9091 }
9092
9093
9094
9095template<typename eT>
9096template<uword fixed_n_rows, uword fixed_n_cols>
9097arma_inline
9098Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::fixed(const fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>& X)
9099 : Mat<eT>( arma_fixed_indicator(), fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols, 0, ((use_extra) ? mem_local_extra : Mat<eT>::mem_local) )
9100 {
9101 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
9102
9103 eT* dest = (use_extra) ? mem_local_extra : mem_local;
9104 const eT* src = (use_extra) ? X.mem_local_extra : X.mem_local;
9105
9106 arrayops::copy( dest, src, fixed_n_elem );
9107 }
9108
9109
9110
9111template<typename eT>
9112template<uword fixed_n_rows, uword fixed_n_cols>
9113template<typename fill_type>
9114inline
9115Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::fixed(const fill::fill_class<fill_type>&)
9116 : Mat<eT>( arma_fixed_indicator(), fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols, 0, ((use_extra) ? mem_local_extra : Mat<eT>::mem_local) )
9117 {
9118 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
9119
9120 if(is_same_type<fill_type, fill::fill_zeros>::yes) { (*this).zeros(); }
9121 if(is_same_type<fill_type, fill::fill_ones >::yes) { (*this).ones(); }
9122 if(is_same_type<fill_type, fill::fill_eye >::yes) { (*this).eye(); }
9123 if(is_same_type<fill_type, fill::fill_randu>::yes) { (*this).randu(); }
9124 if(is_same_type<fill_type, fill::fill_randn>::yes) { (*this).randn(); }
9125 }
9126
9127
9128
9129template<typename eT>
9130template<uword fixed_n_rows, uword fixed_n_cols>
9131template<typename T1>
9132inline
9133Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::fixed(const Base<eT,T1>& A)
9134 : Mat<eT>( arma_fixed_indicator(), fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols, 0, ((use_extra) ? mem_local_extra : Mat<eT>::mem_local) )
9135 {
9136 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
9137
9138 Mat<eT>::operator=(A.get_ref());
9139 }
9140
9141
9142
9143template<typename eT>
9144template<uword fixed_n_rows, uword fixed_n_cols>
9145template<typename T1, typename T2>
9146inline
9147Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::fixed(const Base<pod_type,T1>& A, const Base<pod_type,T2>& B)
9148 : Mat<eT>( arma_fixed_indicator(), fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols, 0, ((use_extra) ? mem_local_extra : Mat<eT>::mem_local) )
9149 {
9150 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
9151
9152 Mat<eT>::init(A,B);
9153 }
9154
9155
9156
9157template<typename eT>
9158template<uword fixed_n_rows, uword fixed_n_cols>
9159inline
9160Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::fixed(const eT* aux_mem)
9161 : Mat<eT>( arma_fixed_indicator(), fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols, 0, ((use_extra) ? mem_local_extra : Mat<eT>::mem_local) )
9162 {
9163 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
9164
9165 eT* dest = (use_extra) ? mem_local_extra : mem_local;
9166
9167 arrayops::copy( dest, aux_mem, fixed_n_elem );
9168 }
9169

9171
9172template<typename eT>
9173template<uword fixed_n_rows, uword fixed_n_cols>
9174inline
9175Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::fixed(const char* text)
9176 : Mat<eT>( arma_fixed_indicator(), fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols, 0, ((use_extra) ? mem_local_extra : Mat<eT>::mem_local) )
9177 {
9178 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
9179
9180 Mat<eT>::operator=(text);
9181 }

9185template<typename eT>
9186template<uword fixed_n_rows, uword fixed_n_cols>
9187inline
9188Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::fixed(const std::string& text)
9189 : Mat<eT>( arma_fixed_indicator(), fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols, 0, ((use_extra) ? mem_local_extra : Mat<eT>::mem_local) )
9190 {
9191 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
9192
9193 Mat<eT>::operator=(text);
9194 }
