9196
9197
9198template<typename eT>
9199template<uword fixed_n_rows, uword fixed_n_cols>
9200inline
9201Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::fixed(const std::initializer_list<eT>& list)
9202 : Mat<eT>( arma_fixed_indicator(), fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols, 0, ((use_extra) ? mem_local_extra : Mat<eT>::mem_local) )
9203 {
9204 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
9205
9206 (*this).operator=(list);
9207 }
9208
9209
9210
9211template<typename eT>
9212template<uword fixed_n_rows, uword fixed_n_cols>
9213inline
9214Mat<eT>&
9215Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::operator=(const std::initializer_list<eT>& list)
9216 {
9217 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
9218
9219 const uword N = uword(list.size());
9220
9221 arma_debug_check( (N > fixed_n_elem), "Mat::fixed: initialiser list is too long" );
9222
9223 eT* this_mem = (*this).memptr();
9224
9225 arrayops::copy( this_mem, list.begin(), N );
9226
9227 for(uword iq=N; iq < fixed_n_elem; ++iq) { this_mem[iq] = eT(0); }
9228
9229 return *this;
9230 }
9231
9232
9233
9234template<typename eT>
9235template<uword fixed_n_rows, uword fixed_n_cols>
9236inline
9237Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::fixed(const std::initializer_list< std::initializer_list<eT> >& list)
9238 : Mat<eT>( arma_fixed_indicator(), fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols, 0, ((use_extra) ? mem_local_extra : Mat<eT>::mem_local) )
9239 {
9240 arma_extra_debug_sigprint_this(this);
9241
9242 Mat<eT>::init(list);
9243 }
9244
9245
9246
9247template<typename eT>
9248template<uword fixed_n_rows, uword fixed_n_cols>
9249inline
9250Mat<eT>&
9251Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::operator=(const std::initializer_list< std::initializer_list<eT> >& list)
9252 {
9253 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
9254
9255 Mat<eT>::init(list);
9256
9257 return *this;
9258 }
9259
9260
9261
9262template<typename eT>
9263template<uword fixed_n_rows, uword fixed_n_cols>
9264arma_inline
9265Mat<eT>&
9266Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::operator=(const fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>& X)
9267 {
9268 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
9269
9270 if(this != &X)
9271 {
9272 eT* dest = (use_extra) ? mem_local_extra : mem_local;
9273 const eT* src = (use_extra) ? X.mem_local_extra : X.mem_local;
9274
9275 arrayops::copy( dest, src, fixed_n_elem );
9276 }
9277
9278 return *this;
9279 }
9280
9281
9282
9283#if defined(ARMA_GOOD_COMPILER)
9284
9285 template<typename eT>
9286 template<uword fixed_n_rows, uword fixed_n_cols>
9287 template<typename T1, typename eop_type>
9288 inline
9289 Mat<eT>&
9290 Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::operator=(const eOp<T1, eop_type>& X)
9291 {
9292 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
9293
9294 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T1::elem_type >::no ));
9295
9296 const bool bad_alias = (eOp<T1, eop_type>::proxy_type::has_subview && X.P.is_alias(*this));
9297
9298 if(bad_alias == false)
9299 {
9300 arma_debug_assert_same_size(fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols, X.get_n_rows(), X.get_n_cols(), "Mat::fixed::operator=");
9301
9302 eop_type::apply(*this, X);
9303 }
9304 else
9305 {
9306 arma_extra_debug_print("bad_alias = true");
9307
9308 Mat<eT> tmp(X);
9309
9310 (*this) = tmp;
9311 }
9312
9313 return *this;
9314 }
9315
9316
9317
9318 template<typename eT>
9319 template<uword fixed_n_rows, uword fixed_n_cols>
9320 template<typename T1, typename T2, typename eglue_type>
9321 inline
9322 Mat<eT>&
9323 Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::operator=(const eGlue<T1, T2, eglue_type>& X)
9324 {
9325 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
9326
9327 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T1::elem_type >::no ));
9328 arma_type_check(( is_same_type< eT, typename T2::elem_type >::no ));
9329
9330 const bool bad_alias =
9331 (
9332 (eGlue<T1, T2, eglue_type>::proxy1_type::has_subview && X.P1.is_alias(*this))
9333 ||
9334 (eGlue<T1, T2, eglue_type>::proxy2_type::has_subview && X.P2.is_alias(*this))
9335 );
9336
9337 if(bad_alias == false)
9338 {
9339 arma_debug_assert_same_size(fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols, X.get_n_rows(), X.get_n_cols(), "Mat::fixed::operator=");
9340
9341 eglue_type::apply(*this, X);
9342 }
9343 else
9344 {
9345 arma_extra_debug_print("bad_alias = true");
9346
9347 Mat<eT> tmp(X);
9348
9349 (*this) = tmp;
9350 }
9351
9352 return *this;
9353 }
9354
9355#endif
9356
9357
9358
9359template<typename eT>
9360template<uword fixed_n_rows, uword fixed_n_cols>
9361arma_inline
9362const Op< typename Mat<eT>::template fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::Mat_fixed_type, op_htrans >
9363Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::t() const
9364 {
9365 return Op< typename Mat<eT>::template fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::Mat_fixed_type, op_htrans >(*this);
9366 }
9367
9368
9369
9370template<typename eT>
9371template<uword fixed_n_rows, uword fixed_n_cols>
9372arma_inline
9373const Op< typename Mat<eT>::template fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::Mat_fixed_type, op_htrans >
9374Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::ht() const
9375 {
9376 return Op< typename Mat<eT>::template fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::Mat_fixed_type, op_htrans >(*this);
9377 }
9378
9379
9380
9381template<typename eT>
9382template<uword fixed_n_rows, uword fixed_n_cols>
9383arma_inline
9384const Op< typename Mat<eT>::template fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::Mat_fixed_type, op_strans >
9385Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::st() const
9386 {
9387 return Op< typename Mat<eT>::template fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::Mat_fixed_type, op_strans >(*this);
9388 }
9389
9390
9391
9392template<typename eT>
9393template<uword fixed_n_rows, uword fixed_n_cols>
9394arma_inline
9395arma_warn_unused
9396const eT&
9397Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::at_alt(const uword ii) const
9398 {
9399 #if defined(ARMA_HAVE_ALIGNED_ATTRIBUTE)
9400
9401 return (use_extra) ? mem_local_extra[ii] : mem_local[ii];
9402
9403 #else
9404 const eT* mem_aligned = (use_extra) ? mem_local_extra : mem_local;
9405
9406 memory::mark_as_aligned(mem_aligned);
9407
9408 return mem_aligned[ii];
9409 #endif
9410 }
9411

9416arma_inline
9417arma_warn_unused
9418eT&
9419Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::operator[] (const uword ii)
9420 {
9421 return (use_extra) ? mem_local_extra[ii] : mem_local[ii];
9422 }

9454const eT&
9455Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::at(const uword ii) const
9456 {

9461
9462template<typename eT>
9463template<uword fixed_n_rows, uword fixed_n_cols>
9464arma_inline
9465arma_warn_unused
9466eT&
9467Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::operator() (const uword ii)
9468 {
9469 arma_debug_check_bounds( (ii >= fixed_n_elem), "Mat::operator(): index out of bounds" );
9470
9471 return (use_extra) ? mem_local_extra[ii] : mem_local[ii];
9472 }
9473
9474
9475
9476template<typename eT>
9477template<uword fixed_n_rows, uword fixed_n_cols>
9478arma_inline
9479arma_warn_unused
9480const eT&
9481Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::operator() (const uword ii) const
9482 {
9483 arma_debug_check_bounds( (ii >= fixed_n_elem), "Mat::operator(): index out of bounds" );
9484
9485 return (use_extra) ? mem_local_extra[ii] : mem_local[ii];
9486 }
9487
9488
9489
9490template<typename eT>
9491template<uword fixed_n_rows, uword fixed_n_cols>
9492arma_inline
9493arma_warn_unused
9494eT&
9495Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::at(const uword in_row, const uword in_col)
9496 {
9497 const uword iq = in_row + in_col*fixed_n_rows;
9498
9499 return (use_extra) ? mem_local_extra[iq] : mem_local[iq];
9500 }
9501
9502
9503
9504template<typename eT>
9505template<uword fixed_n_rows, uword fixed_n_cols>
9506arma_inline
9507arma_warn_unused
9508const eT&
9509Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::at(const uword in_row, const uword in_col) const
9510 {
9511 const uword iq = in_row + in_col*fixed_n_rows;
9512
9513 return (use_extra) ? mem_local_extra[iq] : mem_local[iq];
9514 }
9515
9516
9517
9518template<typename eT>
9519template<uword fixed_n_rows, uword fixed_n_cols>
9520arma_inline
9521arma_warn_unused
9522eT&
9523Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::operator() (const uword in_row, const uword in_col)
9524 {
9525 arma_debug_check_bounds( ((in_row >= fixed_n_rows) || (in_col >= fixed_n_cols)), "Mat::operator(): index out of bounds" );
9526
9527 const uword iq = in_row + in_col*fixed_n_rows;
9528
9529 return (use_extra) ? mem_local_extra[iq] : mem_local[iq];
9530 }
9531
9532
9533
9534template<typename eT>
9535template<uword fixed_n_rows, uword fixed_n_cols>
9536arma_inline
9537arma_warn_unused
9538const eT&
9539Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::operator() (const uword in_row, const uword in_col) const
9540 {
9541 arma_debug_check_bounds( ((in_row >= fixed_n_rows) || (in_col >= fixed_n_cols)), "Mat::operator(): index out of bounds" );
9542
9543 const uword iq = in_row + in_col*fixed_n_rows;
9544
9545 return (use_extra) ? mem_local_extra[iq] : mem_local[iq];
9546 }
9547
9548
9549
9550template<typename eT>
9551template<uword fixed_n_rows, uword fixed_n_cols>
9552arma_inline
9553arma_warn_unused
9554eT*
9555Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::colptr(const uword in_col)
9556 {
9557 eT* mem_actual = (use_extra) ? mem_local_extra : mem_local;
9558
9559 return & access::rw(mem_actual[in_col*fixed_n_rows]);
9560 }
9561
9562
9563
9564template<typename eT>
9565template<uword fixed_n_rows, uword fixed_n_cols>
9566arma_inline
9567arma_warn_unused
9568const eT*
9569Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::colptr(const uword in_col) const
9570 {
9571 const eT* mem_actual = (use_extra) ? mem_local_extra : mem_local;
9572
9573 return & mem_actual[in_col*fixed_n_rows];
9574 }

9579template<uword fixed_n_rows, uword fixed_n_cols>
9580arma_inline
9581arma_warn_unused
9582eT*
9583Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::memptr()
9584 {
9585 return (use_extra) ? mem_local_extra : mem_local;
9586 }

9590template<typename eT>
9591template<uword fixed_n_rows, uword fixed_n_cols>
9592arma_inline
9593arma_warn_unused
9594const eT*
9595Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::memptr() const
9596 {
9597 return (use_extra) ? mem_local_extra : mem_local;
9598 }

9600
9601
9602template<typename eT>
9603template<uword fixed_n_rows, uword fixed_n_cols>
9604arma_inline
9605arma_warn_unused
9606bool
9607Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::is_vec() const
9608 {
9609 return ( (fixed_n_rows == 1) || (fixed_n_cols == 1) );
9610 }
9611
9612
9613
9614template<typename eT>
9615template<uword fixed_n_rows, uword fixed_n_cols>
9616inline
9617const Mat<eT>&
9618Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::fill(const eT val)
9619 {
9620 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
9621
9622 eT* mem_use = (use_extra) ? &(mem_local_extra[0]) : &(mem_local[0]);
9623
9624 arrayops::inplace_set_fixed<eT,fixed_n_elem>( mem_use, val );
9625
9626 return *this;
9627 }
9628
9629
9630
9631template<typename eT>
9632template<uword fixed_n_rows, uword fixed_n_cols>
9633inline
9634const Mat<eT>&
9635Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::zeros()
9636 {
9637 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
9638
9639 eT* mem_use = (use_extra) ? &(mem_local_extra[0]) : &(mem_local[0]);
9640
9641 arrayops::inplace_set_fixed<eT,fixed_n_elem>( mem_use, eT(0) );
9642
9643 return *this;
9644 }
9645
9646
9647
9648template<typename eT>
9649template<uword fixed_n_rows, uword fixed_n_cols>
9650inline
9651const Mat<eT>&
9652Mat<eT>::fixed<fixed_n_rows, fixed_n_cols>::ones()
9653 {
9654 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
9655
9656 eT* mem_use = (use_extra) ? &(mem_local_extra[0]) : &(mem_local[0]);
9657
9658 arrayops::inplace_set_fixed<eT,fixed_n_elem>( mem_use, eT(1) );
9659
9660 return *this;
9661 }
9662
9663
9664
9666template<typename eT>
9667inline
9668void
9669Mat_aux::prefix_pp(Mat<eT>& x)
9670 {
9671 eT* memptr = x.memptr();
9672 const uword n_elem = x.n_elem;
9673
9674 uword i,j;
9675
9676 for(i=0, j=1; j<n_elem; i+=2, j+=2)
9677 {
9678 ++(memptr[i]);
9679 ++(memptr[j]);
9680 }
9681
9682 if(i < n_elem)
9683 {
9684 ++(memptr[i]);
9685 }
9686 }
9687
9688
9689
9691template<typename T>
9692inline
9693void
9694Mat_aux::prefix_pp(Mat< std::complex<T> >& x)
9695 {
9696 x += T(1);
9697 }
9698
9699
9700
9702template<typename eT>
9703inline
9704void
9705Mat_aux::postfix_pp(Mat<eT>& x)
9706 {
9707 eT* memptr = x.memptr();
9708 const uword n_elem = x.n_elem;
9709
9710 uword i,j;
9711
9712 for(i=0, j=1; j<n_elem; i+=2, j+=2)
9713 {
9714 (memptr[i])++;
9715 (memptr[j])++;
9716 }
9717
9718 if(i < n_elem)
9719 {
9720 (memptr[i])++;
9721 }
9722 }
9723
9724
9725
9727template<typename T>
9728inline
9729void
9730Mat_aux::postfix_pp(Mat< std::complex<T> >& x)
9731 {
9732 x += T(1);
9733 }
9734
9735
9736
9738template<typename eT>
9739inline
9740void
9741Mat_aux::prefix_mm(Mat<eT>& x)
9742 {
9743 eT* memptr = x.memptr();
9744 const uword n_elem = x.n_elem;
9745
9746 uword i,j;
9747
9748 for(i=0, j=1; j<n_elem; i+=2, j+=2)
9749 {
9750 --(memptr[i]);
9751 --(memptr[j]);
9752 }
9753
9754 if(i < n_elem)
9755 {
9756 --(memptr[i]);
9757 }
9758 }
9759
9760
9761
9763template<typename T>
9764inline
9765void
9766Mat_aux::prefix_mm(Mat< std::complex<T> >& x)
9767 {
9768 x -= T(1);
9769 }
9770
9771
9772
9774template<typename eT>
9775inline
9776void
9777Mat_aux::postfix_mm(Mat<eT>& x)
9778 {
9779 eT* memptr = x.memptr();
9780 const uword n_elem = x.n_elem;
9781
9782 uword i,j;
9783
9784 for(i=0, j=1; j<n_elem; i+=2, j+=2)
9785 {
9786 (memptr[i])--;
9787 (memptr[j])--;
9788 }
9789
9790 if(i < n_elem)
9791 {
9792 (memptr[i])--;
9793 }
9794 }
9795
9796
9797
9799template<typename T>
9800inline
9801void
9802Mat_aux::postfix_mm(Mat< std::complex<T> >& x)
9803 {
9804 x -= T(1);
9805 }
9806
9807
9808
9809template<typename eT, typename T1>
9810inline
9811void
9812Mat_aux::set_real(Mat<eT>& out, const Base<eT,T1>& X)
9813 {
9814 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
9815
9816 const unwrap<T1> tmp(X.get_ref());
9817 const Mat<eT>& A = tmp.M;
9818
9819 arma_debug_assert_same_size( out, A, "Mat::set_real()" );
9820
9821 out = A;
9822 }
9823
9824
9825
9826template<typename eT, typename T1>
9827inline
9828void
9829Mat_aux::set_imag(Mat<eT>&, const Base<eT,T1>&)
9830 {
9831 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
9832 }
9833
9834
9835
9836template<typename T, typename T1>
9837inline
9838void
9839Mat_aux::set_real(Mat< std::complex<T> >& out, const Base<T,T1>& X)
9840 {
9841 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
9842
9843 typedef typename std::complex<T> eT;
9844
9845 const Proxy<T1> P(X.get_ref());
9846
9847 const uword local_n_rows = P.get_n_rows();
9848 const uword local_n_cols = P.get_n_cols();
9849
9850 arma_debug_assert_same_size( out.n_rows, out.n_cols, local_n_rows, local_n_cols, "Mat::set_real()" );
9851
9852 eT* out_mem = out.memptr();
9853
9854 if(Proxy<T1>::use_at == false)
9855 {
9856 typedef typename Proxy<T1>::ea_type ea_type;
9857
9858 ea_type A = P.get_ea();
9859
9860 const uword N = out.n_elem;
9861
9862 for(uword i=0; i<N; ++i)
9863 {
9864 out_mem[i] = std::complex<T>( A[i], out_mem[i].imag() );
9865 }
9866 }
9867 else
9868 {
9869 for(uword col=0; col < local_n_cols; ++col)
9870 for(uword row=0; row < local_n_rows; ++row)
9871 {
9872 (*out_mem) = std::complex<T>( P.at(row,col), (*out_mem).imag() );
9873 out_mem++;
9874 }
9875 }
9876 }
9877
9878
9879
9880template<typename T, typename T1>
9881inline
9882void
9883Mat_aux::set_imag(Mat< std::complex<T> >& out, const Base<T,T1>& X)
9884 {
9885 arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
9886
9887 typedef typename std::complex<T> eT;
9888
9889 const Proxy<T1> P(X.get_ref());
9890
9891 const uword local_n_rows = P.get_n_rows();
9892 const uword local_n_cols = P.get_n_cols();
9893
9894 arma_debug_assert_same_size( out.n_rows, out.n_cols, local_n_rows, local_n_cols, "Mat::set_imag()" );
9895
9896 eT* out_mem = out.memptr();
9897
9898 if(Proxy<T1>::use_at == false)
9899 {
9900 typedef typename Proxy<T1>::ea_type ea_type;
9901
9902 ea_type A = P.get_ea();
9903
9904 const uword N = out.n_elem;
9905
9906 for(uword i=0; i<N; ++i)
9907 {
9908 out_mem[i] = std::complex<T>( out_mem[i].real(), A[i] );
9909 }
9910 }
9911 else
9912 {
9913 for(uword col=0; col < local_n_cols; ++col)
9914 for(uword row=0; row < local_n_rows; ++row)
9915 {
9916 (*out_mem) = std::complex<T>( (*out_mem).real(), P.at(row,col) );
9917 out_mem++;
9918 }
9919 }
9920 }
9921
9922

@ coord_ascii

@ raw_ascii
raw text (ASCII), without a header
file_type::hdf5_binary_trans
@ hdf5_binary_trans
[DO NOT USE - deprecated] as per hdf5_binary, but save/load the data with columns transposed to rows

@ arma_ascii
Armadillo text format, with a header specifying matrix type and size.
file_type::hdf5_binary
@ hdf5_binary
HDF5: open binary format, not specific to Armadillo, which can store arbitrary data.
file_type::csv_ascii
@ csv_ascii
comma separated values (CSV), without a header
file_type::arma_binary
@ arma_binary
Armadillo binary format (machine dependent), with a header specifying matrix type and size.

@ raw_binary
